name: bulbasaur
description:
Bulbasaur can be seen napping in bright sunlight.
There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun’s rays,
the seed grows progressively larger.

name: ivysaur
description:
There is a bud on this Pokémon’s back. To support its weight,
Ivysaur’s legs and trunk grow thick and strong.
If it starts spending more time lying in the sunlight,
it’s a sign that the bud will bloom into a large flower soon.

name: venusaur
description:
There is a large flower on Venusaur’s back. The flower is said
to take on vivid colors if it gets plenty of nutrition and sunlight.
The flower’s aroma soothes the emotions of people.

name: charmander
description:
The flame that burns at the tip of its tail is an indication
of its emotions. The flame wavers when Charmander
is enjoying itself. If the Pokémon becomes enraged,
the flame burns fiercely.

name: charmeleon
description:
Charmeleon mercilessly destroys its foes using its sharp
claws. If it encounters a strong foe, it turns aggressive.
In this excited state, the flame at the tip of its tail flares with
a bluish white color.

name: charizard
description:
Charizard flies around the sky in search of powerful opponents.
It breathes fire of such great heat that it melts anything.
However, it never turns its fiery breath on any opponent
weaker than itself.

name: squirtle
description:
Squirtle’s shell is not merely used for protection.
The shell’s rounded shape and the grooves on its
surface help minimize resistance in water,
enabling this Pokémon to swim at high speeds.

name: wartortle
description:
Its tail is large and covered with a rich, thick fur. The tail
becomes increasingly deeper in color as Wartortle ages.
The scratches on its shell are evidence of this Pokémon’s
toughness as a battler.

name: blastoise
description:
Blastoise has water spouts that protrude from its shell.
The water spouts are very accurate.
They can shoot bullets of water with enough accuracy
to strike empty cans from a distance of over 160 feet.

name: caterpie
description:
Perhaps because it would like to grow up
quickly, it has a voracious appetite, eating
a hundred leaves a day.

name: metapod
description:
Its shell is filled with a thick liquid. All of the
cells throughout its body are being rebuilt in
preparation for evolution.

name: butterfree
description:
Its wings are covered in toxic scales. If it finds
bird Pokémon going after Caterpie, Butterfree
sprinkles its scales on them to drive them off.

name: weedle
description:
Weedle has an extremely acute sense of smell. It is capable
of distinguishing its favorite kinds of leaves from those it
dislikes just by sniffing with its big red proboscis (nose).

name: kakuna
description:
Kakuna remains virtually immobile as it clings to a tree.
However, on the inside, it is extremely busy as it prepares
for its coming evolution.
This is evident from how hot the shell becomes to the touch.

name: beedrill
description:
Beedrill is extremely territorial. No one should ever approach
its nest—this is for their own safety. If angered, they will attack
in a furious swarm.

name: pidgey
description:
Pidgey has an extremely sharp sense of direction.
It is capable of unerringly returning home to its nest,
however far it may be removed from its familiar surroundings.

name: pidgeotto
description:
Pidgeotto claims a large area as its own territory. This
Pokémon flies around, patrolling its living space. If its territory
is violated, it shows no mercy in thoroughly punishing the foe
with its sharp claws.

name: pidgeot
description:
This Pokémon has a dazzling plumage of beautifully
glossy feathers. Many Trainers are captivated by the
striking beauty of the feathers on its head, compelling
them to choose Pidgeot as their Pokémon.

name: rattata
description:
Its incisors grow continuously throughout its life.
If its incisors get too long, this Pokémon
becomes unable to eat, and it starves to death.

name: raticate
description:
People say that it fled from its enemies by
using its small webbed hind feet to swim
from island to island in Alola.

name: spearow
description:
Its reckless nature leads it to stand up to
others—even large Pokémon—if it has to protect
its territory.

name: fearow
description:
Carrying food through Fearow’s territory is
dangerous. It will snatch the food away from
you in a flash!

name: ekans
description:
By dislocating its jaw, it can swallow prey larger
than itself. After a meal, it curls up and rests.

name: arbok
description:
The latest research has determined that there
are over 20 possible arrangements of the
patterns on its stomach.

name: pikachu
description:
Its nature is to store up electricity. Forests
where nests of Pikachu live are dangerous,
since the trees are so often struck by lightning.

name: raichu
description:
As electricity builds up inside its body, it
becomes more aggressive. One theory is that
the electricity buildup is actually causing stress.

name: sandshrew
description:
It lives in areas of limited rainfall. When danger
approaches, it curls up into a ball to protect its
soft stomach.

name: sandslash
description:
Its claws and horns often break off. The broken
claws and horns can be used to carve plows for
tilling farm fields.

name: nidoran-f
description:
Nidoran<U+2640> has barbs that secrete a powerful poison.
They are thought to have developed as protection for
this small-bodied Pokémon. When enraged, it releases
a horrible toxin from its horn.

name: nidorina
description:
When Nidorina are with their friends or family, they keep
their barbs tucked away to prevent hurting each other.
This Pokémon appears to become nervous if separated
from the others.

name: nidoqueen
description:
Nidoqueen’s body is encased in extremely hard scales.
It is adept at sending foes flying with harsh tackles. This
Pokémon is at its strongest when it is defending its young.

name: nidoran-m
description:
Nidoran<U+2642> has developed muscles for moving its ears. Thanks
to them, the ears can be freely moved in any direction. Even
the slightest sound does not escape this Pokémon’s notice.

name: nidorino
description:
Nidorino has a horn that is harder than a diamond. If it senses
a hostile presence, all the barbs on its back bristle up at once,
and it challenges the foe with all its might.

name: nidoking
description:
Nidoking’s thick tail packs enormously destructive power.
With one swing, it can topple a metal transmission tower. Once
this Pokémon goes on a rampage, there is no stopping it.

name: clefairy
description:
They’re popular, but they’re rare. Trainers who
show them off recklessly may be targeted
by thieves.

name: clefable
description:
It can’t help but hear a pin drop from over half
a mile away, so it lives deep in the mountains
where there aren’t many people or Pokémon.

name: vulpix
description:
Its beautiful tails have made it very popular.
However, if it’s not brushed diligently, it will
be a mass of tangles before you know it.

name: ninetales
description:
It is vindictive and relentless by nature.
Those who cross it even once will be cursed for
a thousand years, along with their descendants.

name: jigglypuff
description:
Recordings of Jigglypuff’s strange lullabies can
be purchased from department stores. These
CDs can be found near the bedding area.

name: wigglytuff
description:
Thanks to its bouncy body and fine fur,
this Pokémon is sought after. Holding one
in your arms while you sleep feels great.

name: zubat
description:
It has no eyeballs, so it can’t see. It checks its
surroundings via the ultrasonic waves it emits
from its mouth.

name: golbat
description:
Every once in a while, you’ll see a Golbat that’s
missing some fangs. This happens when hunger
drives it to try biting a Steel-type Pokémon.

name: oddish
description:
Oddish searches for fertile, nutrient-rich soil, then plants itself.
During the daytime, while it is planted, this Pokémon’s feet
are thought to change shape and become similar to the roots
of trees.

name: gloom
description:
From its mouth Gloom drips honey that smells absolutely
horrible. Apparently, it loves the horrid stench. It sniffs the
noxious fumes and then drools even more of its honey.

name: vileplume
description:
Vileplume has the world’s largest petals. They are used to
attract prey that are then doused with toxic spores. Once the
prey are immobilized, this Pokémon catches and devours them.

name: paras
description:
Whether it’s due to a lack of moisture or a lack
of nutrients, in Alola the mushrooms on Paras
don’t grow up quite right.

name: parasect
description:
The bug is mostly dead, with the mushroom on
its back having become the main body. If the
mushroom comes off, the bug stops moving.

name: venonat
description:
Venonat is said to have evolved with a coat of thin, stiff hair
that covers its entire body for protection. It possesses large
eyes that never fail to spot even minuscule prey.

name: venomoth
description:
Venomoth is nocturnal—it is a Pokémon that only becomes
active at night. Its favorite prey are small insects that gather
around streetlights, attracted by the light in the darkness.

name: diglett
description:
It travels through tunnels that it digs
underground. It hates sunlight, so it comes
out only after the sun goes down.

name: dugtrio
description:
While the three of them normally get along
splendidly, on rare occasions a huge fight will
break out over which head gets to eat first.

name: meowth
description:
When visiting a junkyard, you may catch sight
of it having an intense fight with Murkrow over
shiny objects.

name: persian
description:
Although the jewel on its forehead appears to
be a different color than those of Alolan
Persian, it’s mostly made of the same material.

name: psyduck
description:
Using psychokinesis gives it a headache, so it
normally passes the time spacing out and doing
as little as possible.

name: golduck
description:
Even fast-swimming fish Pokémon can be
disabled by Golduck. It brings them to a
standstill and seizes them.

name: mankey
description:
The smallest of things could cause it to lose its
temper. Because it doesn’t hold in its stress,
this Pokémon can live a long time.

name: primeape
description:
It will never forgive opponents who have
angered it. Even after it has beaten them down
until they can’t move, it never ever forgives.

name: growlithe
description:
While it’s quite friendly toward humans once it’s
grown used to them, in the wild it must be quite
fierce to defend its territory from Rockruff.

name: arcanine
description:
Legends tell of its fighting alongside a general
and conquering a whole country.

name: poliwag
description:
Despite the danger, it wants to come up on land.
So it does its best to waddle along, but when
an enemy finds it, it rushes back to the water.

name: poliwhirl
description:
Although it has become capable of living on
land, it spends its time in the water, where
its prey, fish Pokémon, are plentiful.

name: poliwrath
description:
It’s quite a gifted swimmer, even among
Water-type Pokémon, but it normally spends its
time on land.

name: abra
description:
It uses various psychic powers even while it’s
sleeping, so you can’t tell whether or not
it’s awake.

name: kadabra
description:
It stares at a silver spoon to amplify its psychic
powers before it lets loose. Apparently, gold
spoons are no good.

name: alakazam
description:
Alakazam uses its psychic powers to make the
spoons it carries. Each spoon is an original that
there’s only one of in the whole world.

name: machop
description:
Once this Pokémon has gained enough
confidence and muscle from training with its
friends, it challenges Makuhita to a battle.

name: machoke
description:
When it encounters an enemy that’s truly
mighty, this Pokémon removes the power-save
belt from its waist and unleashes its full power.

name: machamp
description:
It grasps its opponents with its four arms and
twists them up in an intricate hold. People call
it “the Machamp special.”

name: bellsprout
description:
Bellsprout’s thin and flexible body lets it bend and sway
to avoid any attack, however strong it may be. From its mouth,
this Pokémon spits a corrosive fluid that melts even iron.

name: weepinbell
description:
Weepinbell has a large hook on its rear end. At night, the
Pokémon hooks on to a tree branch and goes to sleep.
If it moves around in its sleep, it may wake up to find itself
on the ground.

name: victreebel
description:
Victreebel has a long vine that extends from its head.
This vine is waved and flicked about as if it were an animal
to attract prey. When an unsuspecting prey draws near,
this Pokémon swallows it whole.

name: tentacool
description:
It drifts through the sea searching for prey.
Its poisonous tentacles break off sometimes,
but after a while, they grow back.

name: tentacruel
description:
It fires off ultrasonic waves from its red orbs
to weaken its prey, and then it wraps them up
in its 80 tentacles.

name: geodude
description:
Geodude that have lived a long life have had all
their edges smoothed out until they’re totally
round. They also have a calm, quiet disposition.

name: graveler
description:
It climbs up cliffs as it heads toward the peak
of a mountain. As soon as it reaches the summit,
it rolls back down the way it came.

name: golem
description:
When Golem grow old, they stop shedding their
shells. Those that have lived a long, long time
have shells green with moss.

name: ponyta
description:
Ponyta is very weak at birth. It can barely stand up.
This Pokémon becomes stronger by stumbling and
falling to keep up with its parent.

name: rapidash
description:
Rapidash usually can be seen casually cantering in the fields
and plains. However, when this Pokémon turns serious, its
fiery manes flare and blaze as it gallops its way up to 150 mph.

name: slowpoke
description:
There are some places where Slowpoke is
worshiped because of a long-standing belief
that whenever Slowpoke yawns, it rains.

name: slowbro
description:
Spacing out is basically all it does. It turns back
into Slowpoke if its tail, along with Shellder,
breaks off.

name: magnemite
description:
It’s frequently the cause of power outages,
which is why some power plants send out
electrical signals that it can’t stand.

name: magneton
description:
Delicate equipment can malfunction in areas
inhabited by Magneton, which send out
mysterious electrical signals.

name: farfetchd
description:
Farfetch’d is always seen with a stalk from a plant of some
sort. Apparently, there are good stalks and bad stalks. This
Pokémon has been known to fight with others over stalks.

name: doduo
description:
Doduo’s two heads contain completely identical brains. A
scientific study reported that on rare occasions, there will be
examples of this Pokémon possessing different sets of brains.

name: dodrio
description:
Apparently, the heads aren’t the only parts of the body that
Dodrio has three of. It has three sets of hearts and lungs as
well, so it is capable of running long distances without rest.

name: seel
description:
It has always been supposed that Seel live only
in cold seas. Their having shown up in Alola is
a mystery.

name: dewgong
description:
It swims through the ocean at a speed of eight
knots, searching for Pokémon that will become
its prey. It’s especially fond of Wishiwashi.

name: grimer
description:
It was born from sludge on the ocean floor. In a
sterile environment, the germs within its body
can’t multiply, and it dies.

name: muk
description:
Their food sources have decreased, and their
numbers have declined sharply. Sludge ponds
are being built to prevent their extinction.

name: shellder
description:
The sand that accumulates inside its shell
eventually becomes a pearl. But the pearl gets
in the way, so it spits it out and discards it.

name: cloyster
description:
If areas of Cloyster’s very hard shell get
damaged, those areas swell, gradually growing
into large sharp spikes.

name: gastly
description:
It’s said that gas emanating from a graveyard
was possessed by the grievances of the
deceased and thus became a Pokémon.

name: haunter
description:
On moonless nights, Haunter searches for
someone to curse, so it’s best not to go out
walking around.

name: gengar
description:
You can hear tales told all over the world about
how Gengar will pay a visit to children who
are naughty.

name: onix
description:
Onix has a magnet in its brain. It acts as a compass so that
this Pokémon does not lose direction while it is tunneling.
As it grows older, its body becomes increasingly rounder
and smoother.

name: drowzee
description:
It can be spotted near recreational facilities,
intending to eat the pleasant dreams of children
who enjoyed themselves there that day.

name: hypno
description:
In Alola, Komala is Hypno’s main target. It rarely
harms people.

name: krabby
description:
Krabby live on beaches, burrowed inside holes dug into
the sand. On sandy beaches with little in the way of food,
these Pokémon can be seen squabbling with each other
over territory.

name: kingler
description:
Kingler has an enormous, oversized claw. It waves this huge
claw in the air to communicate with others. However, because
the claw is so heavy, the Pokémon quickly tires.

name: voltorb
description:
Voltorb is extremely sensitive—it explodes at the slightest
of shocks. It is rumored that it was first created when a
Poké Ball was exposed to a powerful pulse of energy.

name: electrode
description:
One of Electrode’s characteristics is its attraction to electricity.
It is a problematical Pokémon that congregates mostly at
electrical power plants to feed on electricity that has just
been generated.

name: exeggcute
description:
Six of them form a single Pokémon. Should one
of the six be lost, the next morning there will
once more be six.

name: exeggutor
description:
It engages its enemies using psychic powers.
Each of its three heads fires off psychokinetic
energy, tripling its power.

name: cubone
description:
At night, it weeps loudly for its dead mother,
but those cries only attract its natural
enemy—Mandibuzz.

name: marowak
description:
It throws bones at Mandibuzz to knock it down.
It’s thought that Marowak is trying to avenge
its parent.

name: hitmonlee
description:
Hitmonlee’s legs freely contract and stretch. Using these
springlike legs, it bowls over foes with devastating kicks.
After battle, it rubs down its legs and loosens the muscles
to overcome fatigue.

name: hitmonchan
description:
Hitmonchan is said to possess the spirit of a boxer who had
been working toward a world championship. This Pokémon
has an indomitable spirit and will never give up in the face
of adversity.

name: lickitung
description:
It checks out whatever’s around it by licking
everything. If you don’t clean off a spot where
it’s licked you, you’ll break out in a rash!

name: koffing
description:
Koffing embodies toxic substances. It mixes the toxins with raw
garbage to set off a chemical reaction that results in a terribly
powerful poison gas. The higher the temperature, the more gas
is concocted by this Pokémon.

name: weezing
description:
Weezing alternately shrinks and inflates its twin bodies to mix
together toxic gases inside. The more the gases are mixed,
the more powerful the toxins become. The Pokémon also
becomes more putrid.

name: rhyhorn
description:
Rhyhorn’s brain is very small. It is so dense, while on a run
it forgets why it started running in the first place. It apparently
remembers sometimes if it demolishes something.

name: rhydon
description:
Rhydon has a horn that serves as a drill. It is used for
destroying rocks and boulders. This Pokémon occasionally
rams into streams of magma, but the armor-like hide prevents
it from feeling the heat.

name: chansey
description:
It seems that other Pokémon’s efforts to take
its delicious, nutritious egg away from it caused
Chansey to get faster at fleeing.

name: tangela
description:
Tangela’s vines snap off easily if they are grabbed. This
happens without pain, allowing it to make a quick getaway.
The lost vines are replaced by newly grown vines the very
next day.

name: kangaskhan
description:
Kangaskhan protects its child by keeping it in
its pouch. It has zero forgiveness for those
who harm its child and will beat them down.

name: horsea
description:
If Horsea senses danger, it will reflexively spray a dense
black ink from its mouth and try to escape. This Pokémon
swims by cleverly flapping the fin on its back.

name: seadra
description:
Seadra generates whirlpools by spinning its body.
The whirlpools are strong enough to swallow even
fishing boats. This Pokémon weakens prey with
these currents, then swallows it whole.

name: goldeen
description:
Although known for their splendid tail fins,
Goldeen apparently compete among themselves
to see whose horn is thickest and sharpest.

name: seaking
description:
Its horn spins like a drill to steadily hollow out
rocks—even harder ones. The coloration of the
male is more vivid.

name: staryu
description:
In many places, there are folktales of stardust
falling into the ocean and becoming Staryu.

name: starmie
description:
Its sparkling core is called “the gem of the sea.”
This core can be made into high-priced
accessories that are traded in secret.

name: mr-mime
description:
Its pantomime skills are wonderful. You may
become enraptured while watching it, but next
thing you know, Mr. Mime has made a real wall.

name: scyther
description:
Its two sharp scythes are more than just
weapons. It uses them with dexterity to dress
its prey before eating.

name: jynx
description:
It sways its hips to a rhythm all its own. The
precise movements of Jynx living in Alola are
truly wonderful.

name: electabuzz
description:
Electricity permeates its body. It swings
its arms round and round to charge up
electricity before unleashing a punch.

name: magmar
description:
Its entire body is burning. When it breathes,
the temperature rises. When it sneezes, flames
shoot out!

name: pinsir
description:
It gets into territorial disputes with Vikavolt.
For some reason, it apparently gets along well
with Heracross in Alola.

name: tauros
description:
They live in groups. The one with the longest,
thickest, and most-scarred horns is the boss
of the herd.

name: magikarp
description:
In the distant past, they were fairly strong, but
they have become gradually weaker over time.

name: gyarados
description:
It fires hyper beams in all directions, burning the
surrounding area to ash. There are some regions
where it’s called “the deity of destruction.”

name: lapras
description:
It likes swimming around with people on its
back. In the Alola region, it’s an important means
of transportation over water.

name: ditto
description:
While it can transform into anything, each Ditto
apparently has its own strengths and
weaknesses when it comes to transformations.

name: eevee
description:
The question of why only Eevee has such
unstable genes has still not been solved.

name: vaporeon
description:
Clean, clear waters are its usual habitat. When
it’s about to be attacked by an invading enemy,
it dives into the water to hide.

name: jolteon
description:
Its lungs contain an organ that creates
electricity. The crackling sound of electricity
can be heard when it exhales.

name: flareon
description:
If it inhales deeply, that’s a sign it’s about to
attack. Prepare to be hit by flames of over
3,000 degrees Fahrenheit!

name: porygon
description:
This Pokémon was created using the
cutting-edge science of 20 years ago, so
many parts of it have since become obsolete.

name: omanyte
description:
Omanyte lived in the seas of antiquity. Its
fossils have been found bearing bite marks from
Archeops, so apparently Archeops preyed on it.

name: omastar
description:
Its heavy shell is thought to be the reason this
ancient Pokémon died out. It’s apparently a
distant ancestor of Octillery.

name: kabuto
description:
This Pokémon thrived 300 million years ago. It’s
said that living specimens can still be seen
in a certain region—a rare sight.

name: kabutops
description:
Its body had begun to change so it could
function on land. But it didn’t adapt in time and
went extinct.

name: aerodactyl
description:
Restored from DNA found in amber, this
Pokémon exhibited ferocity that was greater
than expected. Some casualties resulted.

name: snorlax
description:
It doesn’t do anything other than eat and sleep.
When prompted to make a serious effort,
though, it apparently displays awesome power.

name: articuno
description:
Articuno is a legendary bird Pokémon that can control ice.
The flapping of its wings chills the air. As a result, it is said
that when this Pokémon flies, snow will fall.

name: zapdos
description:
Zapdos is a legendary bird Pokémon that has the ability
to control electricity. It usually lives in thunderclouds.
The Pokémon gains power if it is stricken by lightning bolts.

name: moltres
description:
Moltres is a legendary bird Pokémon that has the ability
to control fire. If this Pokémon is injured, it is said to dip its
body in the molten magma of a volcano to burn and heal itself.

name: dratini
description:
It’s still weak, so it lurks on the floor of bodies
of water, eating whatever food sinks down and
living a quiet life.

name: dragonair
description:
Lakes where Dragonair live are filled with
offerings from people, because they believe this
Pokémon is able to control the weather.

name: dragonite
description:
It flies over raging seas as if they were nothing.
Observing this, a ship’s captain dubbed this
Pokémon “the sea incarnate.”

name: mewtwo
description:
Mewtwo is a Pokémon that was created by genetic
manipulation. However, even though the scientific power
of humans created this Pokémon’s body, they failed to
endow Mewtwo with a compassionate heart.

name: mew
description:
Mew is said to possess the genetic composition of all
Pokémon. It is capable of making itself invisible at will,
so it entirely avoids notice even if it approaches people.

name: chikorita
description:
In battle, Chikorita waves its leaf around to keep the foe at
bay. However, a sweet fragrance also wafts from the leaf,
becalming the battling Pokémon and creating a cozy,
friendly atmosphere all around.

name: bayleef
description:
Bayleef’s neck is ringed by curled-up leaves. Inside each
tubular leaf is a small shoot of a tree. The fragrance of this
shoot makes people peppy.

name: meganium
description:
The fragrance of Meganium’s flower soothes and calms
emotions. In battle, this Pokémon gives off more of its
becalming scent to blunt the foe’s fighting spirit.

name: cyndaquil
description:
Cyndaquil protects itself by flaring up the flames on its back.
The flames are vigorous if the Pokémon is angry. However, if it
is tired, the flames splutter fitfully with incomplete combustion.

name: quilava
description:
Quilava keeps its foes at bay with the intensity of its flames
and gusts of superheated air. This Pokémon applies its
outstanding nimbleness to dodge attacks even while scorching
the foe with flames.

name: typhlosion
description:
Typhlosion obscures itself behind a shimmering heat haze that
it creates using its intensely hot flames. This Pokémon creates
blazing explosive blasts that burn everything to cinders.

name: totodile
description:
Despite the smallness of its body, Totodile’s jaws are very
powerful. While the Pokémon may think it is just playfully
nipping, its bite has enough power to cause serious injury.

name: croconaw
description:
Once Croconaw has clamped its jaws on its foe, it will
absolutely not let go. Because the tips of its fangs are
forked back like barbed fishhooks, they become impossible
to remove when they have sunk in.

name: feraligatr
description:
Feraligatr intimidates its foes by opening its huge mouth.
In battle, it will kick the ground hard with its thick and powerful
hind legs to charge at the foe at an incredible speed.

name: sentret
description:
When Sentret sleeps, it does so while another stands guard.
The sentry wakes the others at the first sign of danger. When
this Pokémon becomes separated from its pack, it becomes
incapable of sleep due to fear.

name: furret
description:
Furret has a very slim build. When under attack, it can slickly
squirm through narrow spaces and get away. In spite of its
short limbs, this Pokémon is very nimble and fleet.

name: hoothoot
description:
Every day, it tilts its head in the same rhythm.
A long time ago, people raised these Pokémon
to serve as clocks.

name: noctowl
description:
With eyes that can see in pitch-darkness, it
never lets its prey escape. Some even call it
“the emperor of dark nights.”

name: ledyba
description:
This Pokémon is very sensitive to cold. In the
warmth of Alola, it appears quite lively.

name: ledian
description:
It’s said that the patterns on its back are
related to the stars in the night sky, but the
details of that relationship remain unclear.

name: spinarak
description:
With threads from its mouth, it fashions sturdy
webs that won’t break even if you set a rock
on them.

name: ariados
description:
Every night, it wanders around in search of
prey, whose movements it restrains by spewing
threads before it bites into them with its fangs.

name: crobat
description:
Its fangs are so sharp, if it bites you in the dark
and sucks your blood, you won’t notice any pain
or realize you’ve been bitten.

name: chinchou
description:
Its two antennae glow softly to lure in prey,
making it a useful Pokémon for night fishing.

name: lanturn
description:
When the bacteria living inside its antennae
absorb Lanturn’s bodily fluids, a strong
luminescent effect is produced.

name: pichu
description:
It still can’t use electricity well. When it’s
surprised or excited, it discharges
electricity unintentionally.

name: cleffa
description:
On nights with many shooting stars,
they gather in packs and dance in circles. If you
should see them, something good will happen!

name: igglybuff
description:
It’s always practicing its singing because it
wants to improve. Even when it’s asleep,
it keeps singing in its dreams!

name: togepi
description:
As its energy, Togepi uses the positive emotions of
compassion and pleasure exuded by people and Pokémon.
This Pokémon stores up feelings of happiness inside its shell,
then shares them with others.

name: togetic
description:
Togetic is said to be a Pokémon that brings good fortune.
When the Pokémon spots someone who is pure of heart,
it is said to appear and share its happiness with that person.

name: natu
description:
Although it still can’t fly, its jumping power is
outstanding. It jumps way up into trees and
plucks the buds from the branches.

name: xatu
description:
It’s said that while this Pokémon has the power
to predict the future, it’s not powerful enough
to change the future it sees.

name: mareep
description:
Clothing made from Mareep’s fleece is easily
charged with static electricity, so a special
process is used on it.

name: flaaffy
description:
In the places on its body where fleece doesn’t
grow, its skin is rubbery and doesn’t conduct
electricity. Those spots are safe to touch.

name: ampharos
description:
The light from its tail can be seen from space.
This is why you can always tell exactly where it
is, which is why it usually keeps the light off.

name: bellossom
description:
A Bellossom grows flowers more beautifully if it has evolved
from a smelly Gloom—the more stinky the better. At night, this
Pokémon closes its petals and goes to sleep.

name: marill
description:
When fishing for food at the edge of a fast-running stream,
Marill wraps its tail around the trunk of a tree. This Pokémon’s
tail is flexible and configured to stretch.

name: azumarill
description:
Azumarill can make balloons out of air. It makes these air
balloons if it spots a drowning Pokémon. The air balloons
enable the Pokémon in trouble to breathe.

name: sudowoodo
description:
It’s so popular with the elderly that there’s a
magazine devoted to this Pokémon. Fans obsess
over the particular length and angle of its arms.

name: politoed
description:
Although its cries sound like screams, a
composer created a beautiful ballad that was
influenced by the sounds.

name: hoppip
description:
This Pokémon drifts and floats with the wind. If it senses the
approach of strong winds, Hoppip links its leaves with other
Hoppip to prepare against being blown away.

name: skiploom
description:
Skiploom’s flower blossoms when the temperature rises
above 64 degrees Fahrenheit. How much the flower opens
depends on the temperature. For that reason, this Pokémon
is sometimes used as a thermometer.

name: jumpluff
description:
Jumpluff rides warm southern winds to cross the sea and fly to
foreign lands. The Pokémon descends to the ground when it
encounters cold air while it is floating.

name: aipom
description:
As it did more and more with its tail, its hands
became clumsy. It makes its nest high in
the treetops.

name: sunkern
description:
Sunkern tries to move as little as it possibly can. It does so
because it tries to conserve all the nutrients it has stored in its
body for its evolution. It will not eat a thing, subsisting only on
morning dew.

name: sunflora
description:
Sunflora converts solar energy into nutrition. It moves around
actively in the daytime when it is warm. It stops moving as
soon as the sun goes down for the night.

name: yanma
description:
Yanma is capable of seeing 360 degrees without having to
move its eyes. It is a great flier that is adept at making sudden
stops and turning midair. This Pokémon uses its flying ability
to quickly chase down targeted prey.

name: wooper
description:
Wooper usually lives in water. However, it occasionally comes
out onto land in search of food. On land, it coats its body with
a gooey, toxic film.

name: quagsire
description:
Quagsire hunts for food by leaving its mouth wide open in
water and waiting for its prey to blunder in unaware. Because
the Pokémon does not move, it does not get very hungry.

name: espeon
description:
Although it originally had no powers at all,
people say its precognitive faculties were
awakened by its need to protect itself.

name: umbreon
description:
This Pokémon is nocturnal. Even in total
darkness, its large eyes can spot its
prey clearly!

name: murkrow
description:
It has a weakness for shiny things. It’s been
known to sneak into the nests of Gabite—noted
collectors of jewels—in search of treasure.

name: slowking
description:
It’s constantly coming up with new ideas that
would change the world, but as soon as it
hits upon a new idea, it forgets it.

name: misdreavus
description:
What gives meaning to its life is surprising
others. If you set your ear against the red orbs
around its neck, you can hear shrieking.

name: unown
description:
This Pokémon is shaped like ancient writing. It is a mystery as
to which came first, the ancient writings or the various Unown.
Research into this topic is ongoing but nothing is known.

name: wobbuffet
description:
Wobbuffet does nothing but endure attacks—it won’t attack on
its own. However, it won’t endure an attack on its tail. When
that happens, the Pokémon will try to take the foe with it using
Destiny Bond.

name: girafarig
description:
Girafarig’s rear head contains a tiny brain that is too small for
thinking. However, the rear head doesn’t need to sleep, so it
can keep watch over its surroundings 24 hours a day.

name: pineco
description:
Motionless, it hangs from trees, waiting for
its bug Pokémon prey to come to it. Its favorite
in Alola is Cutiefly.

name: forretress
description:
When something approaches it, it fires off
fragments of its steel shell in attack. This is not
a conscious action but a conditioned reflex.

name: dunsparce
description:
It travels by digging through the ground.
Diglett and Dunsparce share one another’s
tunnels happily.

name: gligar
description:
Gligar glides through the air without a sound as if it were
sliding. This Pokémon hangs on to the face of its foe using
its clawed hind legs and the large pincers on its forelegs, then
injects the prey with its poison barb.

name: steelix
description:
Steelix lives even further underground than Onix.
This Pokémon is known to dig toward the earth’s core.
There are records of this Pokémon reaching a depth of
over six-tenths of a mile underground.

name: snubbull
description:
It grows close to others easily and is also easily
spoiled. The disparity between its face and its
actions makes many young people wild about it.

name: granbull
description:
While it has powerful jaws, it doesn’t care for
disputes, so it rarely has a chance to display
their might.

name: qwilfish
description:
Qwilfish sucks in water, inflating itself. This Pokémon
uses the pressure of the water it swallowed to shoot toxic
quills all at once from all over its body. It finds swimming
somewhat challenging.

name: scizor
description:
Its body is like steel. Its tough, heavy pincers
are more suited to smashing enemies than
grabbing them.

name: shuckle
description:
Shuckle quietly hides itself under rocks, keeping its body
concealed inside its hard shell while eating berries it has
stored away. The berries mix with its body fluids to become
a juice.

name: heracross
description:
It’s proud of its thick horn. In Alola, its biggest
rival is Vikavolt, which it’s always fighting with.

name: sneasel
description:
They will cooperate to steal eggs from the nests
of bird Pokémon, but fights break out to
determine which one gets to eat the eggs.

name: teddiursa
description:
This Pokémon likes to lick its palms that are sweetened by
being soaked in honey. Teddiursa concocts its own honey
by blending fruits and pollen collected by Beedrill.

name: ursaring
description:
In the forests inhabited by Ursaring, it is said that there are
many streams and towering trees where they gather food. This
Pokémon walks through its forest gathering food every day.

name: slugma
description:
Slugma does not have any blood in its body. Instead, intensely
hot magma circulates throughout this Pokémon’s body,
carrying essential nutrients and oxygen to its organs.

name: magcargo
description:
Magcargo’s body temperature is approximately
18,000 degrees Fahrenheit. Water is vaporized on contact.
If this Pokémon is caught in the rain, the raindrops instantly
turn into steam, cloaking the area in a thick fog.

name: swinub
description:
Swinub roots for food by rubbing its snout against the ground.
Its favorite food is a mushroom that grows under the cover of
dead grass. This Pokémon occasionally roots out hot springs.

name: piloswine
description:
Piloswine is covered by a thick coat of long hair that enables
it to endure the freezing cold. This Pokémon uses its tusks to
dig up food that has been buried under ice.

name: corsola
description:
The pink of Corsola that live in Alola is deep
and vibrant, thanks to seas filled with nutrition.

name: remoraid
description:
This Pokémon clings to Mantine and shares in
its prosperity. When its Mantine is attacked,
Remoraid will fight alongside it!

name: octillery
description:
The ink it spits when escaping is special.
It contains a substance that dulls the sense of
smell, so Pokémon with keen noses get lost.

name: delibird
description:
It shares its food with people who are stranded.
Because Delibird is omnivorous, sometimes
it gives those people bug Pokémon.

name: mantine
description:
Postcards and posters featuring Mantine
leaping elegantly above the waves are popular
souvenirs of Alola.

name: skarmory
description:
The wing feathers it sheds can be processed
and made into knives whose sharpness is
recognized by the finest chefs.

name: houndour
description:
It cooperates with others skillfully. When it
becomes your partner, it’s very loyal to you as
its Trainer and will obey your orders.

name: houndoom
description:
They spew flames mixed with poison to finish
off their opponents. They divvy up their prey
evenly among the members of their pack.

name: kingdra
description:
Kingdra sleeps on the seafloor where it is otherwise devoid
of life. When a storm arrives, the Pokémon is said to awaken
and wander about in search of prey.

name: phanpy
description:
Phanpy uses its long nose to shower itself. When others
gather around, they thoroughly douse each other with water.
These Pokémon can be seen drying their soaking-wet
bodies at the edge of water.

name: donphan
description:
If Donphan were to tackle with its hard body, even a house
could be destroyed. Using its massive strength, the Pokémon
helps clear rock and mud slides that block mountain trails.

name: porygon2
description:
AI has been installed in it. It learns various
things all on its own, but it even remembers
things it doesn’t need to know.

name: stantler
description:
Stantler’s magnificent antlers were traded at high prices as
works of art. As a result, this Pokémon was hunted close to
extinction by those who were after the priceless antlers.

name: smeargle
description:
The fluid of Smeargle’s tail secretions changes
in the intensity of its hue as the Pokémon’s
emotions change.

name: tyrogue
description:
Tyrogue becomes stressed out if it does not get to train every
day. When raising this Pokémon, the Trainer must establish
and uphold various training methods.

name: hitmontop
description:
Hitmontop spins on its head at high speed, all the while
delivering kicks. This technique is a remarkable mix of both
offense and defense at the same time. The Pokémon travels
faster spinning than it does walking.

name: smoochum
description:
When it examines things, before touching them
with its hands, it makes lip contact and then
diligently licks all the dirt off its lips.

name: elekid
description:
When it hears the crash of thunder, Elekid’s
mood improves. It can be useful to record that
sound and play it when Elekid’s feeling down.

name: magby
description:
When flames drip from its nose, that means it
has a cold. Have it lie down for a nice rest in
some magma.

name: miltank
description:
It produces over five gallons of milk a day. The
higher the quality of the pastures it lives in,
the richer and tastier its milk becomes.

name: blissey
description:
Their eggs are such a delicacy that some say
eating one will bring you happiness. These eggs
fetch the highest prices on the market.

name: raikou
description:
Raikou embodies the speed of lightning. The roars of
this Pokémon send shock waves shuddering through the
air and shake the ground as if lightning bolts had come
crashing down.

name: entei
description:
Entei embodies the passion of magma. This Pokémon is
thought to have been born in the eruption of a volcano.
It sends up massive bursts of fire that utterly consume all
that they touch.

name: suicune
description:
Suicune embodies the compassion of a pure spring of water.
It runs across the land with gracefulness. This Pokémon has
the power to purify dirty water.

name: larvitar
description:
Born underground, it eats its way through dirt to
the surface, where its parents are. It doesn’t
deal well with the bright light it finds there.

name: pupitar
description:
This troublesome Pokémon can’t wait to evolve,
so it relieves its stress by wildly propelling itself
around using compressed gas.

name: tyranitar
description:
It wanders through the mountains seeking
opponents to fight. If it finds an opponent that’s
not worthy, Tyranitar ignores it and wanders on.

name: lugia
description:
Lugia’s wings pack devastating power—a light fluttering of its
wings can blow apart regular houses. As a result, this
Pokémon chooses to live out of sight deep under the sea.

name: ho-oh
description:
Ho-Oh’s feathers glow in seven colors depending on the angle
at which they are struck by light. These feathers are said to
bring happiness to the bearers. This Pokémon is said to live at
the foot of a rainbow.

name: celebi
description:
This Pokémon came from the future by crossing over time.
It is thought that so long as Celebi appears, a bright and
shining future awaits us.

name: treecko
description:
Treecko is cool, calm, and collected—it never panics under
any situation. If a bigger foe were to glare at this Pokémon,
it would glare right back without conceding an inch of ground.

name: grovyle
description:
This Pokémon adeptly flies from branch to branch in trees.
In a forest, no Pokémon can ever hope to catch a fleeing
Grovyle however fast they may be.

name: sceptile
description:
Sceptile has seeds growing on its back. They are said to be
bursting with nutrients that revitalize trees. This Pokémon
raises the trees in a forest with loving care.

name: torchic
description:
Torchic has a place inside its body where it keeps its flame.
Give it a hug—it will be glowing with warmth. This Pokémon is
covered all over by a fluffy coat of down.

name: combusken
description:
Combusken battles with the intensely hot flames it spews from
its beak and with outstandingly destructive kicks. This
Pokémon’s cry is very loud and distracting.

name: blaziken
description:
Blaziken has incredibly strong legs—it can easily clear a
30-story building in one leap. This Pokémon’s blazing punches
leave its foes scorched and blackened.

name: mudkip
description:
In water, Mudkip breathes using the gills on its cheeks. If it is
faced with a tight situation in battle, this Pokémon will unleash
its amazing power—it can crush rocks bigger than itself.

name: marshtomp
description:
Marshtomp is much faster at traveling through mud than it is at
swimming. This Pokémon’s hindquarters exhibit obvious
development, giving it the ability to walk on just its hind legs.

name: swampert
description:
Swampert predicts storms by sensing subtle differences in the
sounds of waves and tidal winds with its fins. If a storm is
approaching, it piles up boulders to protect itself.

name: poochyena
description:
Poochyena is an omnivore—it will eat anything. A distinguishing
feature is how large its fangs are compared to its body. This
Pokémon tries to intimidate its foes by making the hair on its
tail bristle out.

name: mightyena
description:
Mightyena travel and act as a pack in the wild. The memory
of its life in the wild compels the Pokémon to obey only
those Trainers that it recognizes to possess superior skill.

name: zigzagoon
description:
The hair on Zigzagoon’s back is bristly. It rubs the hard back
hair against trees to leave its territorial markings. This Pokémon
may play dead to fool foes in battle.

name: linoone
description:
When hunting, Linoone will make a beeline straight for the
prey at a full run. While this Pokémon is capable of topping
60 mph, it has to come to a screeching halt before it can turn.

name: wurmple
description:
Wurmple is targeted by Swellow as prey. This Pokémon
will try to resist by pointing the spikes on its rear at the
attacking predator. It will weaken the foe by leaking poison
from the spikes.

name: silcoon
description:
Silcoon was thought to endure hunger and not consume
anything before its evolution. However, it is now thought
that this Pokémon slakes its thirst by drinking rainwater
that collects on its silk.

name: beautifly
description:
Beautifly has a long mouth like a coiled needle, which is very
convenient for collecting pollen from flowers. This Pokémon
rides the spring winds as it flits around gathering pollen.

name: cascoon
description:
If it is attacked, Cascoon remains motionless however badly it
may be hurt. It does so because if it were to move, its body
would be weak upon evolution. This Pokémon will also not
forget the pain it endured.

name: dustox
description:
When Dustox flaps its wings, a fine dust is scattered all over.
This dust is actually a powerful poison that will even make a
pro wrestler sick. This Pokémon searches for food using its
antennae like radar.

name: lotad
description:
Lotad is said to have dwelled on land before. However, this
Pokémon is thought to have returned to water because the
leaf on its head grew large and heavy. It now lives by floating
atop the water.

name: lombre
description:
Lombre’s entire body is covered by a slippery, slimy film.
It feels horribly unpleasant to be touched by this Pokémon’s
hands. Lombre is often mistaken for a human child.

name: ludicolo
description:
Upon hearing an upbeat and cheerful rhythm, the cells in
Ludicolo’s body become very energetic and active. Even
in battle, this Pokémon will exhibit an amazing amount
of power.

name: seedot
description:
Seedot looks exactly like an acorn when it is dangling from a
tree branch. It startles other Pokémon by suddenly moving.
This Pokémon polishes its body once a day using leaves.

name: nuzleaf
description:
This Pokémon pulls out the leaf on its head and makes a flute
with it. The sound of Nuzleaf’s flute strikes fear and uncertainty
in the hearts of people lost in a forest.

name: shiftry
description:
Shiftry’s large fans generate awesome gusts of wind at a
speed close to 100 feet per second. The whipped-up wind
blows anything away. This Pokémon chooses to live quietly
deep in forests.

name: taillow
description:
Taillow is young—it has only just left its nest. As a result,
it sometimes becomes lonesome and cries at night.
This Pokémon feeds on Wurmple that live in forests.

name: swellow
description:
Swellow is very conscientious about the upkeep of its glossy
wings. Once two Swellow are gathered, they diligently take
care of cleaning each other’s wings.

name: wingull
description:
With its long, thin wings, it catches updrafts
and flies like a glider high up into the sky.

name: pelipper
description:
It places small Pokémon into its spacious beak
and carries them around. No one knows where
it’s taking them.

name: ralts
description:
Ralts has the ability to sense the emotions of people. If its
Trainer is in a cheerful mood, this Pokémon grows cheerful
and joyous in the same way.

name: kirlia
description:
Kirlia uses the horns on its head to amplify its psychokinetic
power. When the Pokémon uses its power, the air around it
becomes distorted, creating mirages of nonexistent scenery.

name: gardevoir
description:
Gardevoir has the psychokinetic power to distort the
dimensions and create a small black hole. This Pokémon
will try to protect its Trainer even at the risk of its own life.

name: surskit
description:
If it’s in a pinch, it will secrete a sweet liquid
from the tip of its head. Syrup made from
gathering that liquid is tasty on bread.

name: masquerain
description:
Masquerain intimidates enemies with the eyelike
patterns of its eyespots. If that doesn’t work, it
deftly makes its escape on its set of four wings.

name: shroomish
description:
If Shroomish senses danger, it shakes its body and scatters
spores from the top of its head. This Pokémon’s spores are
so toxic, they make trees and weeds wilt.

name: breloom
description:
The seeds ringing Breloom’s tail are made of hardened toxic
spores. It is horrible to eat the seeds. Just taking a bite of this
Pokémon’s seed will cause your stomach to rumble.

name: slakoth
description:
Slakoth’s heart beats just once a minute. Whatever happens,
it is content to loaf around motionless. It is rare to see this
Pokémon in motion.

name: vigoroth
description:
Vigoroth is simply incapable of remaining still. Even when it
tries to sleep, the blood in its veins grows agitated, compelling
this Pokémon to run wild throughout the jungle before it can
settle down.

name: slaking
description:
Wherever Slaking live, rings of over a yard in diameter appear
in grassy fields. They are made by the Pokémon as it eats all
the grass within reach while lying prone on the ground.

name: nincada
description:
Nincada lives underground. It uses its sharp claws to carve the
roots of trees and absorb moisture and nutrients.
This Pokémon can’t withstand bright sunlight so avoids it.

name: ninjask
description:
If Ninjask is not trained properly, it will refuse to obey
the Trainer and cry loudly continuously. Because of this
quality, this Pokémon is said to be one that puts the
Trainer’s abilities to the test.

name: shedinja
description:
Shedinja is a peculiar Pokémon. It seems to appear unsought
in a Poké Ball after a Nincada evolves. This bizarre Pokémon
is entirely immobile—it doesn’t even breathe.

name: whismur
description:
Whismur is very timid. If it starts to cry loudly, it becomes
startled by its own crying and cries even harder. When it finally
stops crying, the Pokémon goes to sleep, all tired out.

name: loudred
description:
Loudred shouts while stamping its feet. After it finishes
shouting, this Pokémon becomes incapable of hearing
anything for a while. This is considered to be a weak point.

name: exploud
description:
Exploud communicates its feelings to the others by emitting
whistle-like sounds from the tubes on its body. This Pokémon
only raises its voice when it is in battle.

name: makuhita
description:
It practices its slaps by repeatedly slapping
tree trunks. It has been known to slap an
Exeggutor and get flung away.

name: hariyama
description:
Although they enjoy comparing their strength,
they’re also kind. They value etiquette, praising
opponents they battle.

name: azurill
description:
Azurill’s tail is large and bouncy. It is packed full of the
nutrients this Pokémon needs to grow. Azurill can be seen
bouncing and playing on its big, rubbery tail.

name: nosepass
description:
It moves less than an inch a year, but when
it’s in a jam, it will spin and drill down into the
ground in a split second.

name: skitty
description:
Skitty is known to chase around playfully after its own tail.
In the wild, this Pokémon lives in holes in the trees of forests.
It is very popular as a pet because of its adorable looks.

name: delcatty
description:
Delcatty sleeps anywhere it wants without keeping a permanent
nest. If other Pokémon approach it as it sleeps, this Pokémon
will never fight—it will just move away somewhere else.

name: sableye
description:
It digs through the ground with its hard claws
and crunches down gems with its thick pointy
teeth. Carbink is its favorite food.

name: mawile
description:
A cunning and terrifying Pokémon, its cuteness
makes opponents let down their guard—and
then it swallows them whole with its huge jaws.

name: aron
description:
Aron has a body of steel. With one all-out charge, this
Pokémon can demolish even a heavy dump truck.
The destroyed dump truck then becomes a handy meal
for the Pokémon.

name: lairon
description:
Lairon feeds on iron contained in rocks and water. It makes
its nest on mountains where iron ore is buried. As a result,
the Pokémon often clashes with humans mining the iron ore.

name: aggron
description:
Aggron is protective of its environment. If its mountain is
ravaged by a landslide or a fire, this Pokémon will haul
topsoil to the area, plant trees, and beautifully restore its
own territory.

name: meditite
description:
Meditite heightens its inner energy through meditation.
It survives on just one berry a day. Minimal eating is another
aspect of this Pokémon’s training.

name: medicham
description:
Through the power of meditation, Medicham developed its
sixth sense. It gained the ability to use psychokinetic powers.
This Pokémon is known to meditate for a whole month
without eating.

name: electrike
description:
Friction between the air and its fur produces
static electricity. When Electrike runs, it makes
a crackling sound.

name: manectric
description:
Manectric can be found beneath unnatural
thunderclouds. People say it can run at the
same speed as lightning striking.

name: plusle
description:
When Plusle is cheering on its partner, it flashes with electric
sparks from all over its body. If its partner loses, this Pokémon
cries loudly.

name: minun
volbeat
description:
Volbeat’s tail glows like a lightbulb. With other Volbeat,
it uses its tail to draw geometric shapes in the night sky.
This Pokémon loves the sweet aroma given off by Illumise.

name: illumise
description:
Illumise leads a flight of illuminated Volbeat to draw signs in
the night sky. This Pokémon is said to earn greater respect
from its peers by composing more complex designs in the sky.

name: roselia
description:
On extremely rare occasions, a Roselia is said to appear with
its flowers in unusual colors. The thorns on this Pokémon’s
head contain a vicious poison.

name: gulpin
description:
Most of Gulpin’s body is made up of its stomach—its heart and
brain are very small in comparison. This Pokémon’s stomach
contains special enzymes that dissolve anything.

name: swalot
description:
Swalot has no teeth, so what it eats, it swallows whole, no
matter what. Its cavernous mouth yawns widely. An automobile
tire could easily fit inside this Pokémon’s mouth.

name: carvanha
description:
They’re such cowards that they won’t hunt
alone. When five or so of them get together,
they suddenly turn ferocious!

name: sharpedo
description:
People believe that carrying one of its
discarded fangs will prevent mishaps at sea,
so the fangs are made into accessories.

name: wailmer
description:
It swims along with its mouth open and
swallows down seawater along with its food.
It sprays excess water out of its nostrils.

name: wailord
description:
They eat so many fish Pokémon that when
Wailord become too numerous, fishermen have
to chase them off.

name: numel
description:
Numel stores magma of almost 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit
within its body. If it gets wet, the magma cools and hardens.
In that event, the Pokémon’s body grows heavy and its
movements become sluggish.

name: camerupt
description:
The humps on Camerupt’s back are formed by a transformation
of its bones. They sometimes blast out molten magma.
This Pokémon apparently erupts often when it is enraged.

name: torkoal
description:
You can tell how it’s feeling by the smoke
spouting from its shell. Tremendous velocity
is a sign of good health.

name: spoink
description:
Spoink keeps a pearl on top of its head. The pearl functions to
amplify this Pokémon’s psychokinetic powers. It is therefore on
a constant search for a bigger pearl.

name: grumpig
description:
Grumpig uses the black pearls on its body to wield
its fantastic powers. When it is doing so, it dances bizarrely.
This Pokémon’s black pearls are valuable as works of art.

name: spinda
description:
Its steps are shaky and stumbling. Walking for a
long time makes it feel sick.

name: trapinch
description:
Its jaws are strong enough to crush rocks but
so heavy that it can’t get up if it flips over.
Sandile seize those moments as their chance.

name: vibrava
description:
It vibrates its wings to generate ultrasonic
waves, causing its prey to faint. Then it buries
the prey alive in the sand to preserve it.

name: flygon
description:
By flapping their wings, Flygon cause
sandstorms that conceal Krookodile.
The team then splits the prey they catch.

name: cacnea
description:
The more arid and harsh the environment, the more pretty and
fragrant a flower Cacnea grows. This Pokémon battles by
wildly swinging its thorny arms.

name: cacturne
description:
If a traveler is going through a desert in the thick of night,
Cacturne will follow in a ragtag group. The Pokémon are
biding their time, waiting for the traveler to tire and become
incapable of moving.

name: swablu
description:
Swablu loves to make things clean. If it spots something dirty,
it will wipe and polish it with its cottony wings. If its wings
become dirty, this Pokémon finds a stream and showers itself.

name: altaria
description:
Altaria sings in a gorgeous soprano. Its wings are like cotton
clouds. This Pokémon catches updrafts with its buoyant wings
and soars way up into the wild blue yonder.

name: zangoose
description:
Zangoose usually stays on all fours, but when angered, it gets
up on its hind legs and extends its claws. This Pokémon shares
a bitter rivalry with Seviper that dates back over generations.

name: seviper
description:
Seviper’s swordlike tail serves two purposes—it slashes foes
and douses them with secreted poison. This Pokémon will not
give up its long-running blood feud with Zangoose.

name: lunatone
description:
Lunatone becomes active around the time of the full moon.
Instead of walking, it moves by floating in midair.
The Pokémon’s intimidating red eyes cause all those who
see it to become transfixed with fear.

name: solrock
description:
Sunlight is the source of Solrock’s power. It is said to possess
the ability to read the emotions of others. This Pokémon gives
off intense heat while rotating its body.

name: barboach
description:
Its entire body is gooey. When pecked at by
bird Pokémon, it slips and slides its way
to freedom.

name: whiscash
description:
Whiscash shakes the ground at high intensities
to intimidate its opponents. It swallows its prey
whole—along with mud from the swamp floor.

name: corphish
description:
Individuals that have been set free by Trainers
who could no longer raise them have become
common, and they can now be found in Alola.

name: crawdaunt
description:
Its temperament is rough and it loves to fight,
but as soon as its pincers break off, it turns
cowardly. It stays timid until they grow back.

name: baltoy
description:
Depictions of Pokémon similar to Baltoy have
been found on the walls of caves where
primitive humans lived.

name: claydol
description:
If it gets wet, its body melts. When rain starts
to fall, it wraps its whole body up with its
psychic powers to protect itself.

name: lileep
description:
In ancient times, it lived in warm seas. It
disguised itself as seaweed to ambush its prey
and devoured them whole when they got close.

name: cradily
description:
Normally, it lived on shallow sea shoals. When
the tide went out, this Pokémon came up on
land to search for prey.

name: anorith
description:
When restored Anorith are released into the
ocean, they don’t thrive, because the water
composition has changed since their era.

name: armaldo
description:
It lived on land and went out into the sea to
hunt for prey. Its sharp claws were its
greatest weapon.

name: feebas
description:
They look ragged, so no one catches them. They
look like they’d taste bad, so predators won’t
eat them. And their numbers continue to grow.

name: milotic
description:
While Milotic is said to be the most beautiful
Pokémon, Trainers who like Feebas and have
raised it are seemingly disappointed by Milotic.

name: castform
description:
Although its form changes with the weather,
that is apparently the result of a chemical
reaction and not the result of its own free will.

name: kecleon
description:
It changes its hue to blend into its surroundings.
If no one takes notice of it for too long, it will
pout and never reveal itself.

name: shuppet
description:
It eats up emotions like malice, jealousy, and
resentment, so some people are grateful for
its presence.

name: banette
description:
It’s a stuffed toy that was thrown away and
became possessed, ever searching for the one
who threw it away so it can exact its revenge.

name: duskull
description:
Duskull wanders lost among the deep darkness of midnight.
There is an oft-told admonishment given to misbehaving
children that this Pokémon will spirit away bad children who
earn scoldings from their mothers.

name: dusclops
description:
Dusclops absorbs anything, however large the object may be.
This Pokémon hypnotizes its foe by waving its hands in a
macabre manner and by bringing its single eye to bear.
The hypnotized foe is made to do Dusclops’s bidding.

name: tropius
description:
The bunches of fruit growing around the necks
of Tropius in Alola are especially sweet
compared to those in other regions.

name: chimecho
description:
In high winds, Chimecho cries as it hangs from a tree branch or
the eaves of a building using a suction cup on its head. This
Pokémon plucks berries with its long tail and eats them.

name: absol
description:
The only thing unlucky about Absol is its
appearance. It protects fields and warns people
of disaster, so one ought to be grateful for it.

name: wynaut
description:
Wynaut gather on moonlit nights to play by squeezing up
against each other. By being squeezed, this Pokémon gains
endurance and is trained to dole out powerful counterattacks.

name: snorunt
description:
It feeds mainly on ice and snow. It’s only able to
survive in a limited number of places in the
warm Alola region.

name: glalie
description:
It freezes its prey and chews them whole.
However, it prefers to eat Pokémon like Vanillite
that are already frozen.

name: spheal
description:
Spheal always travels by rolling around on its ball-like body.
When the season for ice floes arrives, this Pokémon can be
seen rolling about on ice and crossing the sea.

name: sealeo
description:
Sealeo often balances and rolls things on the tip of its
nose. While the Pokémon is rolling something, it checks
the object’s aroma and texture to determine whether it likes
the object or not.

name: walrein
description:
Walrein swims all over in frigid seawater while crushing
icebergs with its grand, imposing tusks. Its thick layer of
blubber makes enemy attacks bounce off harmlessly.

name: clamperl
description:
Despite its appearance, it’s carnivorous. It
clamps down on its prey with both sides of its
shell and doesn’t let go until they stop moving.

name: huntail
description:
It’s not the strongest swimmer. It wags its tail to
lure in its prey and then gulps them down as
soon as they get close.

name: gorebyss
description:
The color of its body changes with the water
temperature. The coloration of Gorebyss in Alola
is almost blindingly vivid.

name: relicanth
description:
Thought to have gone extinct, Relicanth was
given a name that is a variation of the name of
the person who discovered it.

name: luvdisc
description:
There was an era when it was overfished due to
the rumor that having one of its heart-shaped
scales would enable you to find a sweetheart.

name: bagon
description:
Whenever it sees bird Pokémon flying through
the sky, it becomes envious and smashes its
surroundings to bits with headbutts.

name: shelgon
description:
The cells within its body are changing at a
bewildering pace. Its hard shell is made from
the same substance as bone.

name: salamence
description:
Overjoyed at finally being able to fly, it flies all
over the place and usually doesn’t land until it’s
completely exhausted and needs to sleep.

name: beldum
description:
Instead of blood, magnetism flows through its
body. When it’s feeling bad, try giving it
a magnet.

name: metang
description:
With its two brains, it fires powerful psychic
energy to stop its prey in their tracks.

name: metagross
description:
It boasts not only psychic powers but also
fantastic strength. It grabs its prey with its four
legs and holds them in place with its claws.

name: regirock
description:
Regirock’s body is composed entirely of rocks. Recently,
a study made the startling discovery that the rocks were all
unearthed from different locations.

name: regice
description:
Regice cloaks itself with frigid air of -328 degrees Fahrenheit.
Things will freeze solid just by going near this Pokémon.
Its icy body is so cold, it will not melt even if it is immersed
in magma.

name: registeel
description:
Registeel was imprisoned by people in ancient times.
The metal composing its body is thought to be a curious
substance that is not of this earth.

name: latias
description:
Latias is highly intelligent and capable of understanding
human speech. It is covered with a glass-like down.
The Pokémon enfolds its body with its down and refracts
light to alter its appearance.

name: latios
description:
Latios will only open its heart to a Trainer with a
compassionate spirit. This Pokémon can fly faster than a
jet plane by folding its forelegs to minimize air resistance.

name: kyogre
description:
Kyogre is said to be the personification of the sea itself.
Legends tell of its many clashes against Groudon,
as each sought to gain the power of nature.

name: groudon
description:
Through Primal Reversion and with nature’s full power,
it will take back its true form. It can cause magma to
erupt and expand the landmass of the world.

name: rayquaza
description:
It flies forever through the ozone layer, consuming
meteoroids for sustenance. The many meteoroids
in its body provide the energy it needs to Mega Evolve.

name: jirachi
description:
Jirachi will awaken from its sleep of a thousand years if you
sing to it in a voice of purity. It is said to make true any wish
that people desire.

name: deoxys
description:
Deoxys emerged from a virus that came from space. It is highly
intelligent and wields psychokinetic powers. This Pokémon
shoots lasers from the crystalline organ on its chest.

name: turtwig
description:
It undertakes photosynthesis with its body, making
oxygen. The leaf on its head wilts if it is thirsty.

name: grotle
description:
It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow
Pokémon there on its back.

name: torterra
description:
Small Pokémon occasionally gather on its unmoving
back to begin building their nests.

name: chimchar
description:
The gas made in its belly burns from its rear end.
The fire burns weakly when it feels sick.

name: monferno
description:
It uses ceilings and walls to launch aerial attacks.
Its fiery tail is but one weapon.

name: infernape
description:
It tosses its enemies around with agility. It uses all
its limbs to fight in its own unique style.

name: piplup
description:
Because it is very proud, it hates accepting food
from people. Its thick down guards it from cold.

name: prinplup
description:
It lives a solitary life. Its wings deliver wicked blows
that can snap even the thickest of trees.

name: empoleon
description:
The three horns that extend from its beak attest to
its power. The leader has the biggest horns.

name: starly
description:
They flock around mountains and fields, chasing
after bug Pokémon. Their singing is noisy
and annoying.

name: staravia
description:
It lives in forests and fields. Squabbles over
territory occur when flocks collide.

name: staraptor
description:
When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave the
flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.

name: bidoof
description:
It constantly gnaws on logs and rocks to whittle
down its front teeth. It nests alongside water.

name: bibarel
description:
It makes its nest by damming streams with bark and
mud. It is known as an industrious worker.

name: kricketot
description:
When its antennae hit each other, it sounds like the
music of a xylophone.

name: kricketune
description:
It signals its emotions with its melodies. Scientists
are studying these melodic patterns.

name: shinx
description:
All of its fur dazzles if danger is sensed. It flees
while the foe is momentarily blinded.

name: luxio
description:
Strong electricity courses through the tips of its
sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.

name: luxray
description:
Luxray’s ability to see through objects comes in
handy when it’s scouting for danger.

name: budew
description:
Over the winter, it closes its bud and endures the
cold. In spring, the bud opens and releases pollen.

name: roserade
description:
With the movements of a dancer, it strikes with
whips that are densely lined with poison thorns.

name: cranidos
description:
A primeval Pokémon, it possesses a hard and
sturdy skull, lacking any intelligence within.

name: rampardos
description:
In ancient times, people would dig up fossils of
this Pokémon and use its skull, which is harder
than steel, to make helmets.

name: shieldon
description:
A mild-mannered, herbivorous Pokémon, it used
its face to dig up tree roots to eat. The skin on
its face was plenty tough.

name: bastiodon
description:
The bones of its face are huge and hard, so
they were mistaken for its spine until after this
Pokémon was successfully restored.

name: burmy
description:
If its cloak is broken in battle, it quickly remakes
the cloak with materials nearby.

name: wormadam
description:
When Burmy evolved, its cloak became a part of
this Pokémon’s body. The cloak is never shed.

name: mothim
description:
It flutters around at night and steals honey from
the Combee hive.

name: combee
description:
It collects and delivers honey to its colony.
At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.

name: vespiquen
description:
Its abdomen is a honeycomb for grubs. It raises its
grubs on honey collected by Combee.

name: pachirisu
description:
A pair may be seen rubbing their cheek pouches
together in an effort to share stored electricity.

name: buizel
description:
It inflates the flotation sac around its neck and
pokes its head out of the water to see what is
going on.

name: floatzel
description:
Its flotation sac developed as a result of pursuing
aquatic prey. It can double as a rubber raft.

name: cherubi
description:
It evolves by sucking the energy out of the small
ball where it had been storing nutrients.

name: cherrim
description:
If it senses strong sunlight, it opens its folded
petals to absorb the sun’s rays with its whole body.

name: shellos
description:
While they normally live in the sea, they can
function on land, too, until their skin dries out.

name: gastrodon
description:
Long ago, it had a shell on its back. There’s now
a vestigial plate on its back that’s hard but thin.

name: ambipom
description:
In their search for comfortable trees, they get
into territorial disputes with groups of
Passimian. They win about half the time.

name: drifloon
description:
Its round body is stuffed with souls and
expands each time it leads someone away.

name: drifblim
description:
There’s a rumor that if you catch a Drifblim
floating on the wind at dusk, you’ll be carried
away to the afterlife.

name: buneary
description:
Its arms and legs are weak, but when it rolls its
ears up tight and then unleashes them with its
full force, it can smash boulders to dust.

name: lopunny
description:
Lopunny regrows its coat twice a year. Mufflers
and hats made from its fur are really warm.

name: mismagius
description:
Feared for its wrath and the curses it spreads,
this Pokémon will also, on a whim, cast spells
that help people.

name: honchkrow
description:
It will absolutely not forgive failure from or
betrayal by its goons. It has no choice in this
if it wants to maintain the order of the flock.

name: glameow
description:
When it’s happy, Glameow demonstrates beautiful
movements of its tail, like a dancing ribbon.

name: purugly
description:
To make itself appear intimidatingly beefy, it tightly
cinches its waist with its twin tails.

name: chingling
description:
There is an orb inside its mouth. When it hops,
the orb bounces all over and makes a
ringing sound.

name: stunky
description:
It protects itself by spraying a noxious fluid from its
rear. The stench lingers for 24 hours.

name: skuntank
description:
It sprays a stinky fluid from its tail. The fluid smells
worse the longer it is allowed to fester.

name: bronzor
description:
Implements shaped like it were discovered in
ancient tombs. It is unknown if they are related.

name: bronzong
description:
Ancient people believed that petitioning Bronzong
for rain was the way to make crops grow.

name: bonsly
description:
It discharges moisture from its eyes, making it
look like it’s crying—apparently an effective way
of getting enemies to let down their guard.

name: mime-jr
description:
It does its absolute best to mimic the
movements and expressions of its opponents,
but it’s still not very good at it.

name: happiny
description:
Usually it’s a well-behaved Pokémon, but if you
take its round rock away, it will cry and fuss
and throw a big old tantrum.

name: chatot
description:
It can learn and speak human words. If they gather,
they all learn the same saying.

name: spiritomb
description:
It was bound to a fissure in an odd keystone as
punishment for misdeeds 500 years ago.

name: gible
description:
It reacts to anything that moves—flies right at it
and bites it. Sometimes it injures itself, but it
doesn’t care too much.

name: gabite
description:
It loves shiny things. When it finds a Sableye
trying to catch a Carbink, Gabite becomes
furiously angry and attacks the Sableye.

name: garchomp
description:
It flies at the speed of sound while searching
for prey, and it has midair battles with
Salamence as the two compete for food.

name: munchlax
description:
It hides food under its long fur, but it
sometimes forgets about it and causes
a stinky disturbance.

name: riolu
description:
It knows how people and Pokémon feel by
looking at their auras. It doesn’t approach
dangerous opponents.

name: lucario
description:
It concentrates its mental energy and fires off
mysterious waves called auras, which can crush
boulders of large size to dust.

name: hippopotas
description:
It enshrouds itself with sand to protect itself from
germs. It does not enjoy getting wet.

name: hippowdon
description:
It blasts internally stored sand from ports on its
body to create a towering twister for attack.

name: skorupi
description:
It burrows under the sand to lie in wait for prey.
Its tail claws can inject its prey with a
savage poison.

name: drapion
description:
It has the power in its clawed arms to make scrap
of a car. The tips of its claws release poison.

name: croagunk
description:
Inflating its poison sacs, it fills the area with an odd
sound and hits flinching opponents with a
poison jab.

name: toxicroak
description:
Its knuckle claws secrete a toxin so vile that even a
scratch could prove fatal.

name: carnivine
description:
It binds itself to trees in marshes. It attracts prey
with its sweet-smelling drool and gulps them down.

name: finneon
description:
When night falls, their pink patterns begin to
shine. They’re popular with divers, so there are
resorts that feed them to keep them close.

name: lumineon
description:
Deep down at the bottom of the ocean, prey is
scarce. Lumineon get into fierce disputes with
Lanturn over food.

name: mantyke
description:
It’s highly friendly and easily tamed. Tours that
take people swimming with Mantyke are a
super-popular beach activity.

name: snover
description:
In the spring, it grows berries with the texture of
frozen treats around its belly.

name: abomasnow
description:
It lives a quiet life on mountains that are perpetually
covered in snow. It hides itself by whipping
up blizzards.

name: weavile
description:
One Weavile will trip a Sandshrew and flip it
over, and then another Weavile will deal the
finishing blow with its sharp claws.

name: magnezone
description:
It uses radar to monitor its territory. Intruders
are quickly disposed of with a hyper beam.

name: lickilicky
description:
A contest is under way to determine which one
can stick its tongue out the farthest. The
current record is...more than 82 feet.

name: rhyperior
description:
It puts rocks in holes in its palms and uses its
muscles to shoot them. Geodude are shot at
rare times.

name: tangrowth
description:
Its vines grow so profusely that, in the warm
season, you can’t even see its eyes.

name: electivire
description:
It grips its tail, which spews electricity, and
then beats down opponents with the power of
its electrified fist.

name: magmortar
description:
There are still quite a few factories that rely on
the flames provided by Magmortar to
process metals.

name: togekiss
description:
It shares many blessings with people who respect
one another’s rights and avoid needless strife.

name: yanmega
description:
This six-legged Pokémon is easily capable of
transporting an adult in flight. The wings on its tail
help it stay balanced.

name: leafeon
description:
Although it doesn’t like disputes, it will sharpen
the leaf on its tail into a blade and fight if it has
to protect its friends.

name: glaceon
description:
It protects itself by freezing its fur into sharp
