needles. It can drop its body temperature below
–75 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: gliscor
description:
Its flight is soundless. It uses its lengthy tail to
carry off its prey... Then its elongated fangs do
the rest.

name: mamoswine
description:
Its impressive tusks are made of ice. The population
thinned when it turned warm after the ice age.

name: porygon-z
description:
Its behavior is noticeably unstable, which is
apparently due to the incompetence of the
engineer who updated its programming.

name: gallade
description:
A master of courtesy and swordsmanship, it fights
using extending swords on its elbows.

name: probopass
description:
Although it can control its units known as
Mini-Noses, they sometimes get lost and don’t
come back.

name: dusknoir
description:
The antenna on its head captures radio waves from
the world of spirits that command it to take
people there.

name: froslass
description:
It freezes hikers who have come to climb snowy
mountains and carries them back to its home. It
only goes after men it thinks are handsome.

name: rotom
description:
Its body is composed of plasma. It is known to
infiltrate electronic devices and wreak havoc.

name: uxie
description:
It is said that its emergence gave humans the
intelligence to improve their quality of life.

name: mesprit
description:
It sleeps at the bottom of a lake. Its spirit is said to
leave its body to fly on the lake’s surface.

name: azelf
description:
It is thought that Uxie, Mesprit, and Azelf all came
from the same egg.

name: dialga
description:
It has the power to control time. It appears in
Sinnoh-region myths as an ancient deity.

name: palkia
description:
It has the ability to distort space. It is described as
a deity in Sinnoh-region mythology.

name: heatran
description:
Boiling blood, like magma, circulates through its
body. It makes its dwelling place in volcanic caves.

name: regigigas
description:
There is an enduring legend that states this
Pokémon towed continents with ropes.

name: giratina
description:
It was banished for its violence. It silently gazed
upon the old world from the Distortion World.

name: cresselia
description:
Those who sleep holding Cresselia’s feather are
assured of joyful dreams. It is said to represent
the crescent moon.

name: phione
description:
It drifts in warm seas. It always returns to where it
was born, no matter how far it may have drifted.

name: manaphy
description:
It starts its life with a wondrous power that permits
it to bond with any kind of Pokémon.

name: darkrai
description:
It can lull people to sleep and make them dream.
It is active during nights of the new moon.

name: shaymin
description:
The blooming of Gracidea flowers confers the
power of flight upon it. Feelings of gratitude are
the message it delivers.

name: arceus
description:
It is told in mythology that this Pokémon was born
before the universe even existed.

name: victini
description:
When it shares the infinite energy it creates,
that being’s entire body will be overflowing
with power.

name: snivy
description:
They photosynthesize by bathing their tails in
sunlight. When they are not feeling well, their
tails droop.

name: servine
description:
When it gets dirty, its leaves can’t be used in
photosynthesis, so it always keeps itself clean.

name: serperior
description:
It can stop its opponents’ movements with just a
glare. It takes in solar energy and boosts
it internally.

name: tepig
description:
It loves to eat roasted berries, but sometimes it
gets too excited and burns them to a crisp.

name: pignite
description:
When its internal fire flares up, its movements grow
sharper and faster. When in trouble, it emits smoke.

name: emboar
description:
It has mastered fast and powerful fighting moves.
It grows a beard of fire.

name: oshawott
description:
It fights using the scalchop on its stomach.
In response to an attack, it retaliates immediately
by slashing.

name: dewott
description:
As a result of strict training, each Dewott learns
different forms for using the scalchops.

name: samurott
description:
One swing of the sword incorporated in its armor
can fell an opponent. A simple glare from one of
them quiets everybody.

name: patrat
description:
Extremely cautious, one of them will always be on
the lookout, but it won’t notice a foe coming
from behind.

name: watchog
description:
When they see an enemy, their tails stand high,
and they spit the seeds of berries stored in their
cheek pouches.

name: lillipup
description:
This Pokémon has excellent judgment.
If it decides it can’t defeat an opponent,
it immediately turns tail and vamooses.

name: herdier
description:
The longer its black fur grows, the harder and
more impervious it gets. Claws and fangs can’t
easily penetrate it.

name: stoutland
description:
It pays no mind to the cold, thanks to its long
warm coat. Stoutland in Alola look a
little uncomfortable.

name: purrloin
description:
They steal from people for fun, but their victims
can’t help but forgive them. Their deceptively cute
act is perfect.

name: liepard
description:
Stealthily, it sneaks up on its target, striking from
behind before its victim has a chance to react.

name: pansage
description:
It’s good at finding berries and gathers them from
all over. It’s kind enough to share them
with friends.

name: simisage
description:
Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its barbed tail
around wildly. The leaf growing on its head is
very bitter.

name: pansear
description:
This Pokémon lives in caves in volcanoes.
The fire within the tuft on its head can reach
600 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: simisear
description:
When it gets excited, embers rise from its head
and tail and it gets hot. For some reason, it
loves sweets.

name: panpour
description:
The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of
nutrients. Plants that receive its water grow large.

name: simipour
description:
It prefers places with clean water. When its tuft runs
low, it replenishes it by siphoning up water with
its tail.

name: munna
description:
It eats the dreams of people and Pokémon. When it
eats a pleasant dream, it expels pink-colored mist.

name: musharna
description:
The dream mist coming from its forehead changes
into many different colors depending on the dream
that was eaten.

name: pidove
description:
These Pokémon live in cities. They are accustomed
to people. Flocks often gather in parks and plazas.

name: tranquill
description:
No matter where in the world it goes, it knows
where its nest is, so it never gets separated from
its Trainer.

name: unfezant
description:
Males have plumage on their heads. They will never
let themselves feel close to anyone other than
their Trainers.

name: blitzle
description:
Its mane shines when it discharges electricity.
They use the frequency and rhythm of these flashes
to communicate.

name: zebstrika
description:
They have lightning-like movements.
When Zebstrika run at full speed, the sound of
thunder reverberates.

name: roggenrola
description:
The hexagonal hole is its ear. Deep in that ear is
an energy core, so if you stick your hand in
there, Roggenrola will be very angry!

name: boldore
description:
The energy overflowing from its body has
turned into orange crystals that are hard
enough to smash diamonds.

name: gigalith
description:
When it fires off energy with all its might, the
power creates countless fissures on its body.

name: woobat
description:
The heart-shaped mark left on a body after a
Woobat has been attached to it is said to bring
good fortune.

name: swoobat
description:
Anyone who comes into contact with the ultrasonic
waves emitted by a courting male experiences a
positive mood shift.

name: drilbur
description:
By spinning its body, it can dig straight through the
ground at a speed of 30 mph.

name: excadrill
description:
More than 300 feet below the surface, they build
mazelike nests. Their activity can be destructive to
subway tunnels.

name: audino
description:
It touches others with the feelers on its ears, using
the sound of their heartbeats to tell how they
are feeling.

name: timburr
description:
Always carrying squared logs, they help out with
construction. As they grow, they carry bigger logs.

name: gurdurr
description:
This Pokémon is so muscular and strongly built that
even a group of wrestlers could not make it budge
an inch.

name: conkeldurr
description:
Rather than rely on force, they master moves that
utilize the centrifugal force of spinning concrete.

name: tympole
description:
By vibrating its cheeks, it emits sound waves
imperceptible to humans. It uses the rhythm of
these sounds to talk.

name: palpitoad
description:
It lives in the water and on land. It uses its long,
sticky tongue to immobilize its opponents.

name: seismitoad
description:
They shoot paralyzing liquid from their head bumps.
They use vibration to hurt their opponents.

name: throh
description:
When it encounters a foe bigger than itself, it wants
to throw it. It changes belts as it gets stronger.

name: sawk
description:
Tying their belts gets them pumped and makes their
punches more destructive. Disturbing their training
angers them.

name: sewaddle
description:
Since this Pokémon makes its own clothes out of
leaves, it is a popular mascot for fashion designers.

name: swadloon
description:
It protects itself from the cold by wrapping up in
leaves. It stays on the move, eating leaves
in forests.

name: leavanny
description:
It keeps its eggs warm with heat from fermenting
leaves. It also uses leaves to make warm wrappings
for Sewaddle.

name: venipede
description:
Its bite injects a potent poison, enough to paralyze
large bird Pokémon that try to prey on it.

name: whirlipede
description:
It is usually motionless, but when attacked,
it rotates at high speed and then crashes into
its opponent.

name: scolipede
description:
With quick movements, it chases down its foes,
attacking relentlessly with its horns until it prevails.

name: cottonee
description:
To protect itself, it shoots cotton from its body.
When it gets wet in the rain, its cotton grows
moist and heavy, and it can’t move as well.

name: whimsicott
description:
This nuisance sneaks into people’s homes,
where it hides important things and scatters
cotton all over the place.

name: petilil
description:
Some say if you dry the leaves on its head, boil
them down, and drink the infusion, your vigor
will return, so Petilil is popular with the elderly.

name: lilligant
description:
The fragrance of its flower differs slightly
depending on the soil where it grew up.
Sniffing the aroma calms your heart and mind.

name: basculin
description:
Savage, violent Pokémon, red and blue Basculin
are always fighting each other over territory.

name: sandile
description:
Alola, where it’s warm all year round, is a
comfortable environment for this Pokémon.
Sometimes you’ll even see it outside of deserts.

name: krokorok
description:
Krokorok really hates it when its body gets
cold. On nights when the temperature drops,
it digs deep into the desert sands.

name: krookodile
description:
When it spots prey, even at a distance of over
30 miles, it swims through the desert as if it
were water, then jumps out and chomps them.

name: darumaka
description:
When it sleeps, it pulls its limbs into its
body and its internal fire goes down to
1,100 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: darmanitan
description:
Its internal fire burns at 2,500 degrees Fahrenheit,
making enough power that it can destroy a dump
truck with one punch.

name: maractus
description:
Arid regions are their habitat. They move
rhythmically, making a sound similar to maracas.

name: dwebble
description:
When it finds a stone of a suitable size, it secretes
a liquid from its mouth to open up a hole to
crawl into.

name: crustle
description:
Competing for territory, Crustle fight viciously.
The one whose boulder is broken is the loser of
the battle.

name: scraggy
description:
They move in small groups, walking around lazily.
Anyone who makes eye contact gets smacked
with a headbutt.

name: scrafty
description:
This Pokémon may be rude, but it takes very
good care of its family, its friends, and its turf.

name: sigilyph
description:
The guardians of an ancient city, they always fly
the same route while keeping watch for invaders.

name: yamask
description:
Each of them carries a mask that used to be its face
when it was human. Sometimes they look at it
and cry.

name: cofagrigus
description:
Grave robbers who mistake them for real coffins and
get too close end up trapped inside their bodies.

name: tirtouga
description:
It was restored from an ancient fossil. Tirtouga
lived in the sea but came up onto the land to
search for prey.

name: carracosta
description:
Its jaws are terrifyingly powerful. It could eat
Omastar and Omanyte whole and not be
bothered in the slightest by their shells.

name: archen
description:
Once thought to be the ancestor of all bird
Pokémon, some of the latest research suggests
that may not be the case.

name: archeops
description:
This ancient Pokémon’s plumage is delicate,
so if anyone other than an experienced
professional tries to restore it, they will fail.

name: trubbish
description:
Poisonous gas leaks out of it when it breathes.
Muk that catch a whiff of that stench will
come drooling.

name: garbodor
description:
It locks opponents in place with its left hand,
immobilizing them by entirely dousing their
bodies with poisonous liquid.

name: zorua
description:
This Pokémon has a cowardly disposition, so
when it’s not around friends, it basically
always stays transformed as something else.

name: zoroark
description:
It doesn’t just transform itself—it also has the
power to make hundreds of people see
its illusions.

name: minccino
description:
A clean freak that will not allow even the
slightest mess, it uses its tail like a mop to
thoroughly clean any and all filth.

name: cinccino
description:
The white parts of its coat are covered in an oil
secreted from its body, so this Pokémon can
slide right away from its enemies’ attacks.

name: gothita
description:
They intently observe both Trainers and Pokémon.
Apparently, they are looking at something that only
Gothita can see.

name: gothorita
description:
According to many old tales, it creates friends for
itself by controlling sleeping children on
starry nights.

name: gothitelle
description:
They can predict the future from the placement and
movement of the stars. They can see Trainers’
life spans.

name: solosis
description:
They drive away attackers by unleashing psychic
power. They can use telepathy to talk with others.

name: duosion
description:
When their two divided brains think the same
thoughts, their psychic power is maximized.

name: reuniclus
description:
When Reuniclus shake hands, a network forms
between their brains, increasing their
psychic power.

name: ducklett
description:
They are better at swimming than flying, and they
happily eat their favorite food, peat moss, as they
dive underwater.

name: swanna
description:
Swanna start to dance at dusk. The one dancing in
the middle is the leader of the flock.

name: vanillite
description:
It exhales cold air that is at –58 degrees
Fahrenheit. When it’s in a warm place, it shrinks
little by little.

name: vanillish
description:
It sprays its enemies with grains of ice to freeze
them. Most Vanillish in Alola are smaller
than average.

name: vanilluxe
description:
It blasts blizzards from its two mouths. It can
create snow anywhere, so it gets a lot of love
from skiers and snowboarders.

name: deerling
description:
The turning of the seasons changes the color and
scent of this Pokémon’s fur. People use it to mark
the seasons.

name: sawsbuck
description:
They migrate according to the seasons, so some
people call Sawsbuck the harbingers of spring.

name: emolga
description:
They store up electricity to fly through the air.
When thunder cracks at night, sometimes there
are almost enough of them to blot out the sky.

name: karrablast
description:
For some reason they evolve when they receive
electrical energy while they are attacking Shelmet.

name: escavalier
description:
These Pokémon evolve by wearing the shell
covering of a Shelmet. The steel armor protects
their whole body.

name: foongus
description:
It lures Pokémon with its pattern that looks just like
a Poké Ball, then releases poison spores.

name: amoonguss
description:
It lures prey close by dancing and waving its
arm caps, which resemble Poké Balls, in a
swaying motion.

name: frillish
description:
It wraps its veillike arms and legs around prey
swimming by and drags them down to the
depths of the ocean.

name: jellicent
description:
Jellicent is always hanging around fancy cruise
ships and tankers, hoping to drag away its prey.

name: alomomola
description:
Fishermen take them along on long voyages,
because if you have an Alomomola with you,
there’ll be no need for a doctor or medicine.

name: joltik
description:
They attach themselves to large-bodied Pokémon
and absorb static electricity, which they store in an
electric pouch.

name: galvantula
description:
When attacked, they create an electric barrier by
spitting out many electrically charged threads.

name: ferroseed
description:
It absorbs the iron it finds in the rock while clinging
to the ceiling. It shoots spikes when in danger.

name: ferrothorn
description:
They attach themselves to cave ceilings, firing steel
spikes at targets passing beneath them.

name: klink
description:
The two minigears that mesh together are
predetermined. Each will rebound from other
minigears without meshing.

name: klang
description:
A minigear and big gear comprise its body. If the
minigear it launches at a foe doesn’t return, it
will die.

name: klinklang
description:
Its red core functions as an energy tank. It fires the
charged energy through its spikes into an area.

name: tynamo
description:
One alone can emit only a trickle of electricity,
so a group of them gathers to unleash a powerful
electric shock.

name: eelektrik
description:
These Pokémon have a big appetite. When they
spot their prey, they attack it and paralyze it
with electricity.

name: eelektross
description:
They crawl out of the ocean using their arms.
They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag
it into the ocean.

name: elgyem
description:
It controls tremendous psychic power. Most
reports of alien sightings are actually just
people mistaking Elgyem for an alien.

name: beheeyem
description:
With its psychic powers, it rewrites its
opponents’ memories. You, too, may have
already had your memories rewritten.

name: litwick
description:
Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of
people and Pokémon, which becomes the fuel that
it burns.

name: lampent
description:
It arrives near the moment of death and steals spirit
from the body.

name: chandelure
description:
The spirits burned up in its ominous flame lose their
way and wander this world forever.

name: axew
description:
They mark their territory by leaving gashes in trees
with their tusks. If a tusk breaks, a new one grows
in quickly.

name: fraxure
description:
A broken tusk will not grow back, so it diligently
sharpens its tusks on river rocks after the end of
a battle.

name: haxorus
description:
Their sturdy tusks will stay sharp even if used to cut
steel beams. These Pokémon are covered in
hard armor.

name: cubchoo
description:
Their snot is a barometer of health. When healthy,
their snot is sticky and the power of their ice
moves increases.

name: beartic
description:
It freezes its breath to create fangs and claws of ice
to fight with. Cold northern areas are its habitat.

name: cryogonal
description:
They are composed of ice crystals. They capture
prey with chains of ice, freezing the prey at
-148 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: shelmet
description:
It evolves when bathed in an electric-like energy
along with Karrablast. The reason is still unknown.

name: accelgor
description:
When its body dries out, it weakens. So, to prevent
dehydration, it wraps itself in many layers of
thin membrane.

name: stunfisk
description:
It conceals itself in the mud of the seashore.
Then it waits. When prey touch it, it delivers a jolt
of electricity.

name: mienfoo
description:
They can often be seen in packs in the morning,
slowly moving their bodies through a series
of poses.

name: mienshao
description:
It overwhelms its opponents with continuous
attacks and then slowly stores up power
before delivering the finishing blow.

name: druddigon
description:
The red skin on its face is harder than rock.
In narrow caves, it squares off against its
enemies and charges face-first right into them.

name: golett
description:
Its movements are powered by a mysterious
energy. It has continued to move since ancient
times, so its power may soon run out.

name: golurk
description:
Some say that ancient people invented Golurk
to serve as a laborer. It follows its master’s
orders faithfully.

name: pawniard
description:
After shredding its prey, it sharpens its blades
on a stone by the river. Each Pawniard has its
own favorite sharpening stone.

name: bisharp
description:
No matter how strong the Bisharp, it’s said
that if the blade on its head is chipped, it will
retire from its position as the boss.

name: bouffalant
description:
Their fluffy fur absorbs damage, even if they strike
foes with a fierce headbutt.

name: rufflet
description:
With its powerful legs and sturdy claws, it can
crack even the hard shells of Shellder and pluck
out their insides.

name: braviary
description:
The more scars it has on its front, the more
heroic it’s considered to be. Those with many
scars on their back are mocked by the flock.

name: vullaby
description:
Mandibuzz gives it the bones it wears. Vullaby’s
wings are short, so it can’t fly yet, but it jumps
around, dreaming of wide open skies.

name: mandibuzz
description:
It skillfully arranges the bones of its prey to
construct its nest. Most of the bones
are Cubone.

name: heatmor
description:
It draws in air through its tail, transforms it into fire,
and uses it like a tongue. It melts Durant and
eats them.

name: durant
description:
They attack in groups, covering themselves in steel
armor to protect themselves from Heatmor.

name: deino
description:
Lacking sight, it’s unaware of its surroundings,
so it bumps into things and eats anything
that moves.

name: zweilous
description:
After it has eaten up all the food in its territory,
it moves to another area. Its two heads do not
get along.

name: hydreigon
description:
It responds to movement by attacking. This scary,
three-headed Pokémon devours everything in
its path!

name: larvesta
description:
When battling opponents, it sprays fire from its
five horns. The max temperature of the flames
can reach nearly 5,500 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: volcarona
description:
As it flies, it scatters its flaming scales. It was
feared by ancient people, who referred to it as
“the rage of the sun.”

name: cobalion
description:
It has a body and heart of steel. It worked with its
allies to punish people when they hurt Pokémon.

name: terrakion
description:
Spoken of in legend, this Pokémon used its
phenomenal power to destroy a castle in its effort
to protect Pokémon.

name: virizion
description:
Legends say this Pokémon confounded opponents
with its swift movements.

name: tornadus
description:
Tornadus expels massive energy from its tail,
causing severe storms. Its power is great enough
to blow houses away.

name: thundurus
description:
As it flies around, it shoots lightning all over
the place and causes forest fires. It is
therefore disliked.

name: reshiram
description:
When Reshiram’s tail flares, the heat energy moves
the atmosphere and changes the world’s weather.

name: zekrom
description:
Concealing itself in lightning clouds, it flies
throughout the Unova region. It creates electricity
in its tail.

name: landorus
description:
From the forces of lightning and wind, it creates
energy to give nutrients to the soil and make the
land abundant.

name: kyurem
description:
It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside
itself, but its body became frozen when the energy
leaked out.

name: keldeo
description:
When it is resolute, its body fills with power and it
becomes swifter. Its jumps are then too fast
to follow.

name: meloetta
description:
Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization
method that can control the feelings of those who
hear it.

name: genesect
description:
This Pokémon existed 300 million years ago. Team
Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.

name: chespin
description:
Such a thick shell of wood covers its head and back
that even a direct hit from a truck wouldn’t faze it.

name: quilladin
description:
They strengthen their lower bodies by
running into one another. They are very
kind and won’t start fights.

name: chesnaught
description:
When it takes a defensive posture with its fists
guarding its face, it could withstand a bomb blast.

name: fennekin
description:
As it walks, it munches on a twig in place
of a snack. It intimidates opponents
by puffing hot air out of its ears.

name: braixen
description:
When the twig is plucked from its tail,
friction sets the twig alight. The flame
is used to send signals to its allies.

name: delphox
description:
Using psychic power, it generates a
fiery vortex of 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit,
incinerating foes swept into this whirl of flame.

name: froakie
description:
It protects its skin by covering its body in
delicate bubbles. Beneath its happy-go-lucky air,
it keeps a watchful eye on its surroundings.

name: frogadier
description:
Its swiftness is unparalleled.
It can scale a tower of more
than 2,000 feet in a minute’s time.

name: greninja
description:
It appears and vanishes with a ninja’s grace.
It toys with its enemies using swift movements, while
slicing them with throwing stars of sharpest water.

name: bunnelby
description:
It has ears like shovels. Digging holes
strengthens its ears so much that they
can sever thick roots effortlessly.

name: diggersby
description:
As powerful as an excavator, its ears
can reduce dense bedrock to rubble.
When it’s finished digging, it lounges lazily.

name: fletchling
description:
While it’s an amiable Pokémon, if you touch it
unexpectedly, it will heat up its body in an
instant, and you’ll be burned.

name: fletchinder
description:
It scatters embers in the tall grass. Then bug
Pokémon, frightened by the flames, come
flying out, and Fletchinder gobbles them up.

name: talonflame
description:
Its tough wings don’t allow fire to pass through
them. A long time ago, firefighters’ outfits were
made from Talonflame wings.

name: scatterbug
description:
The powder that covers its body
regulates its temperature, so it
can live in any region or climate.

name: spewpa
description:
The beaks of bird Pokémon can’t begin
to scratch its stalwart body.
To defend itself, it spews powder.

name: vivillon
description:
The patterns on this Pokémon’s wings
depend on the climate and topography
of its habitat. It scatters colorful scales.

name: litleo
description:
When they’re young, they live with a pride. Once
they’re able to hunt prey on their own, they’re
kicked out and have to make their own way.

name: pyroar
description:
The males are usually lazy, but when attacked
by a strong foe, a male will protect its friends
with no regard for its own safety.

name: flabebe
description:
It’s not safe without the power of a flower, but
it will keep traveling around until it finds one
with the color and shape it wants.

name: floette
description:
It raises flowers and uses them as weapons.
The more gorgeous the blossom, the more
power it contains.

name: florges
description:
It controls the flowers it grows. The petal
blizzards that Florges triggers are overwhelming
in their beauty and power.

name: skiddo
description:
If it has sunshine and water, it doesn’t
need to eat, because it can generate
energy from the leaves on its back.

name: gogoat
description:
They inhabit mountainous regions.
The leader of the herd is decided by
a battle of clashing horns.

name: pancham
description:
It follows Pangoro around like a henchman.
When Pancham makes a big mistake, its leaf
gets taken away.

name: pangoro
description:
This rowdy Pokémon boasts great physical
strength. Many Trainers are also smitten by its
lively character.

name: furfrou
description:
There was an era when aristocrats would
compete to see who could trim their Furfrou’s
fur into the most exquisite style.

name: espurr
description:
It has enough psychic energy to blast
everything within 300 feet of itself,
but it has no control over its power.

name: meowstic
description:
The eyeball patterns on the interior of its ears
emit psychic energy. It keeps the patterns tightly
covered because that power is too immense.

name: honedge
description:
If anyone dares to grab its hilt, it wraps
a blue cloth around that person’s arm and
drains that person’s life energy completely.

name: doublade
description:
The complex attack patterns of its two swords
are unstoppable, even for an opponent
greatly accomplished at swordplay.

name: aegislash
description:
Apparently, it can detect the innate qualities
of leadership. According to legend, whoever it
recognizes is destined to become king.

name: spritzee
description:
In the past, rather than using perfume,
royal ladies carried a Spritzee
that would waft a fragrance they liked.

name: aromatisse
description:
Its scent is so overpowering that, unless a Trainer
happens to really enjoy the smell, he or she will
have a hard time walking alongside it.

name: swirlix
description:
Because it eats nothing but sweets,
its fur is as sticky sweet as cotton candy.

name: slurpuff
description:
Its sense of smell is 100 million times better than
a human’s, so even the faintest scent tells it about
everything in the area. It’s like it can see with its nose!

name: inkay
description:
It draws prey near with its blinking lights and
then wraps them up in its long tentacles and
holds them in place.

name: malamar
description:
When it comes to strong hypnosis, there’s an
endless number of people who utilize Malamar
for their nefarious deeds.

name: binacle
description:
They stretch and then contract, yanking their
rocks along with them in bold hops. They eat
seaweed that washes up on the shoreline.

name: barbaracle
description:
Barbaracle’s legs and hands have minds
of their own, and they will move independently.
But they usually follow the head’s orders.

name: skrelp
description:
It vanishes into seaweed and remains perfectly
still to avoid attacks from large Pokémon.
Rotten seaweed is its main food source.

name: dragalge
description:
This vicious Pokémon sprays a poisonous liquid
on opponents that come near. For whatever
reason, it gets along really well with Dhelmise.

name: clauncher
description:
Its claws occasionally fall off, and it keeps a low
profile until they grow back. The meat of its
claws is so delicious!

name: clawitzer
description:
It compresses the water it has sucked up and
then projects it with enough power to punch a
hole right through a thick sheet of iron.

name: helioptile
description:
The frills on either side of its head have cells
that generate electricity when exposed to sunlight.

name: heliolisk
description:
It stimulates its muscles with electricity,
boosting the strength in its legs and enabling
it to run 100 yards in five seconds.

name: tyrunt
description:
Its large jaw has incredible destructive power.
Some theories suggest that its restored form is
different from its form of long ago.

name: tyrantrum
description:
Complete restoration is impossible, allowing
room for theories that its entire body was
once covered in a feather-like coat.

name: amaura
description:
It lived in cold areas in ancient times. It’s said
that when Amaura whinnies, auroras appear in
the night sky.

name: aurorus
description:
An Aurorus was found frozen solid within a
glacier, just as it appeared long ago, which
became quite a big event in the news.

name: sylveon
description:
Once a fight breaks out, it will unflinchingly
charge at dragon Pokémon that are many times
larger than itself.

name: hawlucha
description:
It overwhelms opponents with quick moves, but
sometimes it showboats for too long when it’s
using a special move and gets itself into a pinch.

name: dedenne
description:
It sneaks into people’s homes and steals
electricity from their outlets. When your electric
bill seems off, it’s the handiwork of this rascal.

name: carbink
description:
Some say that deep beneath the surface of the
world, a pack of Carbink live with their queen in
a kingdom of jewels.

name: goomy
description:
It uses its horns to check out its surroundings.
They’re very sensitive, so if you grab them, it
will feel a strong shock and be unable to move.

name: sliggoo
description:
It crawls along sluggishly. The swirly protrusion
on its back is filled with its brain and
other organs.

name: goodra
description:
It’s very friendly toward people. If you grow
close to it, Goodra will hug you with its sticky,
slime-covered body. Don’t get mad.

name: klefki
description:
Although it’s unclear why it collects keys, giving
it a key makes Klefki very happy. However, it
apparently only likes master keys.

name: phantump
description:
By imitating the voice of a child, it causes
people to get hopelessly lost deep in the forest.
It’s trying to make friends with them.

name: trevenant
description:
It’s feared as a ghost of the forest.
Lumberjacks bring along Fire types, which
Trevenant hates, when they enter the forest.

name: pumpkaboo
description:
It is said to carry wandering spirits
to the place where they belong
so they can move on.

name: gourgeist
description:
It enwraps its prey in its hairlike arms.
It sings joyfully as it observes the
suffering of its prey.

name: bergmite
description:
Using air of -150 degrees Fahrenheit, they
freeze opponents solid. They live in herds
above the snow line on mountains.

name: avalugg
description:
The way several Bergmite huddle
on its back makes it look like
an aircraft carrier made of ice.

name: noibat
description:
Fruits are its favorite foods. This gourmet
carefully picks out just the ripe ones using
its sonar.

name: noivern
description:
Although it has a violent disposition, if you give
it a nice ripe fruit that it loves, Noivern will
suddenly become tame.

name: xerneas
description:
When the horns on its head shine
in seven colors, it is said to be
sharing everlasting life.

name: yveltal
description:
When its life comes to an end, it absorbs
the life energy of every living thing
and turns into a cocoon once more.

name: zygarde
description:
This is Zygarde’s form when about half of its
pieces have been assembled. It plays the role of
monitoring the ecosystem.

name: diancie
description:
It can instantly create many diamonds
by compressing the carbon in the air
between its hands.

name: hoopa
description:
It is said to be able to seize anything it desires
with its six rings and six huge arms. With its power
sealed, it is transformed into a much smaller form.

name: volcanion
description:
It expels its internal steam from the
arms on its back. It has enough
power to blow away a mountain.

name: rowlet
description:
It sends its feathers, which are as sharp as
blades, flying in attack. Its legs are strong,
so its kicks are also formidable.

name: dartrix
description:
This narcissistic Pokémon is a clean freak.
If you don’t groom it diligently, it will stop
listening to you.

name: decidueye
description:
It nocks its arrow quills and shoots them at
opponents. When it simply can’t afford to miss,
it tugs the vine on its head to improve its focus.

name: litten
description:
If you try too hard to get close to it, it won’t
open up to you. Even if you do grow close, giving
it too much affection is still a no-no.

name: torracat
description:
It can act spoiled if it grows close to its Trainer.
A powerful Pokémon, its sharp claws can leave
its Trainer’s whole body covered in scratches.

name: incineroar
description:
Although it’s rough mannered and egotistical, it
finds beating down unworthy opponents boring.
It gets motivated for stronger opponents.

name: popplio
description:
The balloons it inflates with its nose grow
larger and larger as it practices day by day.

name: brionne
description:
It gets excited when it sees a dance it doesn’t
know. This hard worker practices diligently until
it can learn that dance.

name: primarina
description:
To Primarina, every battle is a stage. It takes
down its prey with beautiful singing
and dancing.

name: pikipek
description:
It pecks at trees with its hard beak. You can
get some idea of its mood or condition from the
rhythm of its pecking.

name: trumbeak
description:
It can bend the tip of its beak to produce over
a hundred different cries at will.

name: toucannon
description:
They smack beaks with others of their kind to
communicate. The strength and number of hits
tell each other how they feel.

name: yungoos
description:
Its stomach takes up most of its long torso.
It’s a big eater, so the amount Trainers have to
spend on its food is no laughing matter.

name: gumshoos
description:
Although it wasn’t originally found in Alola, this
Pokémon was brought over a long time ago
when there was a huge Rattata outbreak.

name: grubbin
description:
If you find its nest, you shouldn’t stick your
hand inside. You’ll get bitten by an
irritated Grubbin.

name: charjabug
description:
It buries itself in fallen leaves and barely
moves, munching away on humus. If you
accidentally step on one, you’ll get a shock!

name: vikavolt
description:
It has an organ that generates electricity in its
abdomen. It concentrates energy in its strong
jaws and fires off powerful jolts of electricity.

name: crabrawler
description:
Its hard pincers are well suited to both offense
and defense. Fights between two Crabrawler
are like boxing matches.

name: crabominable
description:
It stores coldness in its pincers and pummels its
foes. It can even smash thick walls of ice
to bits!

name: oricorio
description:
It wins the hearts of its enemies with its
passionate dancing and then uses the opening
it creates to burn them up with blazing flames.

name: cutiefly
description:
Nectar and pollen are its favorite fare. In fields
of flowers, it gets into skirmishes with
Butterfree over food.

name: ribombee
description:
Rain makes pollen damp, so Ribombee hates
rain. When it sees ominous clouds, it finds a
hollow in a tree, where it waits stock-still.

name: rockruff
description:
As they develop, their disposition grows more
violent and aggressive. Many Trainers find them
too much to handle and abandon them.

name: lycanroc
description:
The sharp rocks in its mane can cut like knives.
Lycanroc wears its prey down by degrees
before finishing them off.

name: wishiwashi
description:
They’re weak, so they move in schools.
However, they can also often be seen all alone,
having strayed from the school.

name: mareanie
description:
They eat Corsola branches, so Mareanie are
hated by craftsmen who work with Corsola
branches that have naturally fallen off.

name: toxapex
description:
To attack, this Pokémon sends toxic spikes
flying at its enemies. Ones that come close get
mown down by the claws on its feet.

name: mudbray
description:
It loves playing in the mud. If it isn’t showered
with mud on a daily basis, it gets stressed
out and stops listening to its Trainer.

name: mudsdale
description:
It remains calm and unmoving no matter the
situation. It mixes dirt with the saliva in its
mouth to make a special kind of mud.

name: dewpider
description:
When two Dewpider meet, they display their
water bubbles to each other. Then the one with
the smaller bubble gets out of the other’s way.

name: araquanid
description:
It usually passes its time in the water. When its
belly is full, it stores its subdued prey in the
water bubble on its head.

name: fomantis
description:
When the sun rises, Fomantis spreads its four
leaves and bathes in the sunlight. The tip of its
head has a pleasant aroma.

name: lurantis
description:
For self-protection, it pretends to be a bug
Pokémon. Both of its arms bear
keen-edged petals.

name: morelull
description:
It scatters its shining spores around itself.
Even though they’re dangerous, nighttime tours
of forests where Morelull live are popular.

name: shiinotic
description:
It puts its prey to sleep and siphons off their
vitality through the tip of its arms. If one of its
kind is weakened, it helps by sending it vitality.

name: salandit
description:
The males will do whatever the females tell
them. They give the females most of their food.
Due to malnutrition, the males can’t evolve.

name: salazzle
description:
Salazzle lives deep in caves and forces the
Salandit it has attracted with its pheromones
to serve it.

name: stufful
description:
It boasts power enough to split large trees in
half. The organ on its rear releases an odor that
it uses to communicate with others of its kind.

name: bewear
description:
It waves its hands wildly in intimidation and
warning. Life is over for anyone who doesn’t
run away as fast as possible.

name: bounsweet
description:
Because of its sweet, delicious aroma, bird
Pokémon are always after it, but it’s not
intelligent enough to care.

name: steenee
description:
It’s protected by its hard sepals, so it plays
with bird Pokémon without worry. They peck it
relentlessly, but it doesn’t care.

name: tsareena
description:
A master of grand and beautiful kicks, it can
knock out even kickboxing champions with a
single blow.

name: comfey
description:
It stretches sticky vines out from its head and
picks flowers to adorn itself with. When it
doesn’t have any flowers, it feels uneasy.

name: oranguru
description:
It normally spends its time meditating in the
treetops. It throws Poké Balls and gives other
Pokémon orders as it pleases.

name: passimian
description:
They use their saliva to stick leaves to their
shoulders. You can tell what troop they belong
to from the position of the leaves.

name: wimpod
description:
It will pick up anything it finds on the ground.
Sometimes it finds coins, so Murkrow and
Meowth will go after it.

name: golisopod
description:
The shell covering its body is as hard as
diamond. This Pokémon will do anything it
takes to win.

name: sandygast
description:
It likes the shovel on its head, so Sandygast
will get serious and fight any children who come
to take it back.

name: palossand
description:
Each of its grains of sand has its own will.
Palossand eats small Pokémon and siphons
away their vital essence while they’re still alive.

name: pyukumuku
description:
The tradition known as Pyukumuku chucking
started from the custom of throwing Pyukumuku
back into the sea after they wash onshore.

name: type-null
description:
A Pokémon weapon developed for a specific
mission, it went berserk during an experiment,
so it was cryogenically frozen.

name: silvally
description:
This is its form once it has awakened and
evolved. Freed from its heavy mask, its speed is
greatly increased.

name: minior
description:
It lives in the ozone layer, where it becomes
food for stronger Pokémon. When it tries to run
away, it falls to the ground.

name: komala
description:
It stays asleep from the moment it’s born.
When it falls into a deep sleep, it stops
moving altogether.

name: turtonator
description:
It lives in volcanoes and eats sulfur and other
minerals. Materials from the food it eats form
the basis of its explosive shell.

name: togedemaru
description:
When it’s surprised or agitated, the 14 fur
spikes on its back will stand up involuntarily.

name: mimikyu
description:
Although it’s a quiet, lonely Pokémon, if you try
to look at what’s under its rag, it will become
agitated and resist violently.

name: bruxish
description:
It burrows beneath the sand, radiating
psychic power from the protuberance on its
head. It waits for prey as it surveys the area.

name: drampa
description:
If a child it has made friends with is bullied,
Drampa will find the bully’s house and burn it to
the ground.

name: dhelmise
description:
It wraps its prey in green seaweed and sucks
away their vitality. It only likes to go after big
prey like Wailord.

name: jangmo-o
description:
It smacks the scales on its head against rocks
or against the ground to frighten its opponents.
It can also contact its friends with these noises.

name: hakamo-o
description:
It makes noise by clanging its scales together.
When the rhythm has reached its peak,
Hakamo-o attacks.

name: kommo-o
description:
When it howls after finishing off its prey, the
metallic sounds of its celebrating comrades can
be heard from all around.

name: tapu-koko
description:
Although it’s called a guardian deity, if a person
or Pokémon puts it in a bad mood, it will become
a malevolent deity and attack.

name: tapu-lele
description:
It heals the wounds of people and Pokémon by
sprinkling them with its sparkling scales. This
guardian deity is worshiped on Akala.

name: tapu-bulu
description:
Although it’s called a guardian deity, it’s violent
enough to crush anyone it sees as an enemy.

name: tapu-fini
description:
This guardian deity of Poni Island manipulates
water. Because it lives deep within a thick fog,
it came to be both feared and revered.

name: cosmog
description:
Even though its helpless, gaseous body can be
blown away by the slightest breeze, it doesn’t
seem to care.

name: cosmoem
description:
The king who ruled Alola in times of antiquity
called it the “cocoon of the stars” and built
an altar to worship it.

name: solgaleo
description:
Sometimes the result of its opening an Ultra
Wormhole is that energy and life-forms from
other worlds are called here to this world.

name: lunala
description:
Records of it exist in writings from long, long
ago, where it was known by the name
“the beast that calls the moon.”

name: nihilego
description:
A life-form from another world, it was dubbed
a UB and is thought to produce a
strong neurotoxin.

name: buzzwole
description:
Although it’s alien to this world and a danger
here, it’s apparently a common organism in the
world where it normally lives.

name: pheromosa
description:
A life-form that lives in another world, its body
is thin and supple, but it also possesses
great power.

name: xurkitree
description:
Although it’s alien to this world and a danger
here, it’s apparently a common organism in the
world where it normally lives.

name: celesteela
description:
One of the dangerous UBs, high energy readings
can be detected coming from both of its
huge arms.

name: kartana
description:
This Ultra Beast’s body, which is as thin as
paper, is like a sharpened sword.

name: guzzlord
description:
Although it’s alien to this world and a danger
here, it’s apparently a common organism in the
world where it normally lives.

name: necrozma
description:
It looks somehow pained as it rages around in
search of light, which serves as its energy.
It’s apparently from another world.

name: magearna
description:
It synchronizes its consciousness with others
to understand their feelings. This faculty makes
it useful for taking care of people.

name: marshadow
description:
It slips into the shadows of others and mimics
their powers and movements. As it improves, it
becomes stronger than those it’s imitating.

name: poipole
description:
This Ultra Beast is well enough liked to be
chosen as a first partner in its own world.

name: naganadel
description:
It stores hundreds of liters of poisonous liquid
inside its body. It is one of the organisms known
as UBs.

name: stakataka
description:
It appeared from an Ultra Wormhole. Each one
appears to be made up of many life-forms
stacked one on top of each other.

name: blacephalon
description:
It slithers toward people. Then, without warning,
it triggers the explosion of its own head.
It’s apparently one kind of Ultra Beast.

name: zeraora
description:
It electrifies its claws and tears its opponents
apart with them. Even if they dodge its attack,
they’ll be electrocuted by the flying sparks.
